name: Absolute Tennis Manager 2
summary: Immerse yourself in the world of tennis with ATM 2! Create or take on the role of a player and manage every aspect of their career: schedule, training, staff, personal life... Build your legend, tournament after tournament, and aim for the ultimate place in the Hall of Fame.

name: Abyss Born
summary: Abyss Born is a single-player dark action RPG with survival and dungeon crawler elements. Fight various monsters, explore dangerous dungeons, trade with allies and complete quests to find a friend and face evil.

name: Absolute Fear: Aooni
summary:
20 years after the birth of the legendary horror game "AOONI"...
A completely new first-person, 3D horror stealth action "Absolute Fear -AOONI-" is now available!

name: About Love, Hate and the other ones
summary: About Love, Hate and the other ones“ is a mindbending puzzle game in which you take control of the two main characters Love and Hate. Guide them through 60 levels to take them back home to their beloved hill. You will encounter different Other Ones with unique behaviours, depending on whether Love or Hate interacts with them.

name: Abyss Rebel
summary: ABYSS REBEL is a Turn-Based Tactical RPG combining grid strategy, intense combat, and loot progression. Set sail for a frozen archipelago at the universe’s edge, lead a four-member squad on a skiff, equipping skills, relics, tackling bosses and summoning mechs to shatter encroaching darkness!

name: Abandon Ship
summary: Take command of an 'Age of Sail' ship and her crew, exploring a vast, story-filled world that reacts to your decisions. Engage enemy vessels, fortifications and sea monsters in brutal tactical combat, all framed in an art style inspired by classic Naval Oil Paintings.

name: Abandon: The Town
summary:
A Source 2013 mod with a focus on gunplay over puzzles or story. Weapons feel better, enemies are a lot tougher, and the player can no longer quick save to try and cheese their way through situations. Play this if you're looking for a mod that actually makes some changes to the game rather than just a pack of maps set in the Half Life universe, but be sure to expect a challenge!

The mod is basically 100% focused on combat and is in some ways more of a proof of concept than a full game. So in other words there isn't really a story to speak of and it ends a bit abruptly. That being said more content is in development and everything I'm developing in this will be put to use in future work so look forward to that.

I'm currently very open to any assistance from experienced developers. I have very specific goals in mind so if you're looking for a project that isn't going to wander into the unrealistic territory that kills a lot of mods, this is it.

name: Abyssals
summary: Abyssals is a Survival City Builder in the dark depths of an inhospitable planet. Build your underwater colony, explore where light can’t reach, and hunt for scarce resources. Expand your infrastructure and power your lamps, as danger lies in the deep, hidden in the dark.

name: Absolute Tactics: Daughters of Mercy
summary: Absolute Tactics: Daughters of Mercy is a light-hearted, turn-based RPG adventure that puts a modern spin on classic tactics-style games. Featuring a diverse cast of characters, enormous boss monsters, and a dark world embroiled in war, Absolute Tactics plunges players right into the action as our hero Huxley and his dog Max build their team of allies to defend their home against a mysterious invading army.

name: Abandoned: Discovery Island - Jeff The Killer
summary: Abandoned: Discovery Island - Jeff The Killer is a Minigame version of Abandoned: Discovery Island, created by Photo Negative Mickey. Minigame later ported to Abandoned: Discovery Island in the next update.

name: About a Boy
summary: “About a Boy” immerses players in a narrative-driven journey set in a future city devoid of humanity as we know it. Through the eyes of Miro, a boy with the unique ability to perceive people based on their animal temperaments, players embark on a puzzle point-and-click adventure.

name: A Boy and His Blob
summary: When Blobolonia is threatened by an evil Emperor, the blob comes to Earth looking for help. Instead, he finds a young boy. Help the blob dethrone the evil Emperor that's terrorizing Blobolonia and establish a friendship with the blob that will last a lifetime.

name: Ablaze
summary: Those alien bastards have built a base in the mountains. Your mission: destroy it.

name: A Better World
summary: A Better World Company is hiring! We’re looking for a skilled new recruit to alter the past and reshape the future! Use our Computer to travel back in time, and make game-changing choices to make the world a better place! You decide what to do… as long as you follow our internal policies.

name: Abrams Tank
summary:
You're the attack tank they refer to when things go really f'ed up. 
 
You're the guy that gets things done. 
 
You're here for a reason. 
 
There's people to rescue, mutants to kill. Get in, rescue/kill, get out. Without any questions. That's your priority. Politics, 
flags, loyalties, or even the thrill of the ride, you aren't concerned with none of that. Your single concern is the meeting the objective, 
with deadly precision or else your failure will be seen from space. 
 
 
Features: 
- 20 levels of pulse pounding action. 
 
- High Tech Tank with 2 firing modes: regular and charged. 
 
- Afterburner which makes your tank run faster. 
 
- Mutated enemies trying to attack you at every corner. 
 
- Emphasis on gameplay over graphics

name: Abide With Me
summary: A game about the inability to communicate.

name: Abstract Arena
summary: Abstract Arena is a top-down action-shooter game set in a completely abstract context. Up to 6 different ships can clash in the Arena, taking advantage of all of the unique and balanced skills each of them owns. Fast, precise, powerful: the gameplay is easy to learn but hard to master, adaptable to many play styles thanks to the variety of situations the player is brought to encounter.

name: Aban Hawkins and the 1,001 Spikes
summary: Old-school indie platformer for PS Vita.

name: A Bug's Life
summary: A Bug's Life is a bootleg Mega Drive port of the game with the same name for the Game Boy Color published by Unite Lucky Technology in 2000. It was also then ported to the SNES in the same year and was published by DVS Electronic Co.

name: A Better World
summary: A Better World tells the story of two women on the run from the Institute: Jo and Liz, and their mission to create a better, safer world. After three years of relative safety, their past has caught up with them: they find themselves hunted by retention synths and a rogue, ruthless courser, with everything they’ve worked to build at stake. To support this story, A Better World features a dual setting split between the vast wilderness of Abbot County and the derelict ruins of an underground pre-war shopping center called Vault-Tec Plaza.

name: Abyssal Merge
summary: Merge fish to blast horrors! Abyssal Merge is a Suika-shooter roguelike where every merge scales your power. Shoot fish down to grow, and auto-fire up to survive eldritch waves. Featuring boss fights, unlockable ships, and a unique coin-shooting shop. Hold the line!

name: ABC Follow Me: Animals - Extended Edition
Abraca: Imagic Games
summary: Imagi is the country where fairy tale characters live, with its bad guys and damsels in distress. So much so that becoming prince charming is a treacherous path where the gloves really come off! Two, three or four players all pretend to be princes who must survive a series of challenges!

name: Abyss: Backrooms Pools Horror VR
summary:
The man woke up and found himself in a strange place.
There were huge pools of murky water all around, reflecting dim light. Every step echoed, and it felt like someone was watching you. The walls seemed to move, and it was unclear where you were. With each turn of the maze, the feeling of being watched grew stronger.

name: Abandoned: Discovery Island
summary: Abandoned: Discovery Island (Five Nights at Treasure Island: Found before V0.8.0) is a fanmade revival of Five Nights at Treasure Island, a fangame based off of Five Nights at Freddy's by Scott Cawthon and Abandoned By Disney by Christopher Howard Wolf.

name: Abracademia
summary: Become a wizard, and a thumping good one! Abracademia is a cozy mage idle life-sim that lives on your screen and keeps you company while you work or play. Pick a coven, manage your daily routine, learn spells, make friends, embark on adventures, and pass exams on your way to graduation.

name: AbsentedAge 2: Ghostbound
summary: Absented Age is a fresh mix of genres: an action RPG outside of combat that becomes a roguelike-style strategy RPG during combat.

name: Abyss Defence
summary: As darkness falls, monstrous Abyss creatures emerge. Command your units, gather resources from plants, and survive each night. Defend the Crystal from increasingly powerful enemies in this pixel art RTS defense game.

name: Abyss Pact
summary: Abyss Pact is an adventure fighting RPG,where you become a talented heroic warrior to protect the last remaining pure land, and embark on your own legendary path!

name: Abyss Cave
summary: As a member of an elite squad, you are tasked with a mission to penetrate into the great abyss. You are to explore an unknown cave system and eliminate all threats that may arise, Good luck Soldier!

name: Abscam
summary: Abscam is one of many Pac-Man bootlegs. Based on FBI's controversial Abscam sting operation, it was developed by GL and published by US Billiards in 1982.

name: Abuzittin'in Maceraları II: İz Peşinde
summary: This game starts in fullscreen. “Çıkış” in the menu or Alt+F4 shortcut will exit the game. In the intro, the developer states that the game “is sutiable for ages 11 and up”, “contains unfavourable behaviors” and “contains vulgarity”.Full Turkish solution of the game can be found in Extras.

name: Abiotic Factor: Temple of Stone
summary: Visit mystery-laden ruins in the Temple of Stone - a Home World, which is a base-building portal location and a home-away-from-home. This pack also contains the official GATE Botanist uniform, which you can wear as you wander the hedge garden and ponder ancient, time-worn enigmas.

name: Abomination Ops
summary: A strange action-packed sci-fi visual novel with elements of horror and comedy. Brought to you by the Dynamic Solutions Megacorporation (a member of the Dynamic Holdings Group).

name: Abyss Memory Fallen Angel and the Path of Magic
summary: Worldwide Drawing Adventure Challenge Strive forward with easy-to-learn controls. Drawing action! Protect, connect, aid, and guide with your mouse. Mariel will continue to walk in a single direction. Draw paths with your mouse and aid Mariel on her adventure through the Abyss.

name: A Bad Space Game
summary: This is a Game about maneuvering a Spaceship through Rings all while trying to avoid some Rocks. Think you can manage? Test your patience in 8 increasingly challenging LvL´s consisting of flying through Rings Dodging Rocks and getting Boosted in between.

name: Abyss of Twisted Fates
summary: It is a game based on the theme of Sword Art Online. The story revolves around Kirito finding Cardinal's message in a large library, revealing that the secret chamber in the Western End Mountains requires three keys to unlock. Kirito and Eydis embark on a journey to unravel the mystery of the seal.

name: ABC Search with Me
summary: Discover new words and learn foreign languages in a fast, easy and fun way!

name: A Brat's Journey: A Rose Playing Game
summary: A narrative-driven RPG where you play as rosedoodle, a teal-haired catsprout, and embark on a journey across Stardust Valley. Visit various locations and interact with many of the Vchiban friends and family. Try and gather all the collectables, some which require gacha luck, fishing skill, and a sharp eye for details. Game lovingly made by rosedoodle's community for her 10th year anniversary.

name: Abyssus: Brineguard Pack
summary: As a Brineguard, your duty is to protect your team from the corrupted inhabitants of the ancient ruins. Show your unwavering commitment to your mission with the new Brineguard Cosmetic Pack!

name: Abduction Escape
summary: An old-school Flash game where you play as someone who’s been abducted by aliens and needs to escape before becoming their next experiment.

name: Abyss Dungeon
summary: Hack and Slash, Mystery Dungeon The dungeon is randomly generated and changes shape every time you enter. You may encounter monsters in the dungeon. Battles with monsters are turn-based, and monsters don't move until you move. Pick up treasure chests scattered throughout the dungeon.

name: Absurd Frog
summary: Start as a tiny frog, eat smaller creatures, grow in size and strength, evolve into a monstrous amphibian that's even bigger than elephants. How absurdly big can you get?

name: Abyss Crawlers Plus
summary:
A little girl Lily explores around the dungeon with beating monsters.
Let's beat the monsters with robot, sword, gun and trained body.
roguelike action game.

name: Abyss Seeker: What Do You See Deep in The Abyss
summary: A dungeon known as the Abyss has suddenly appeared. To open the "Door of Darkness" at its deepest point, the Seeker plunges into the dungeon gate... in search of the truth. Survive the onslaught of dark forces in this twin-stick survival shooter! — Do you have the will?

name: Abysm 2: Infernal Contract
summary: Abysm 2: Infernal Contract is an action adventure GZDoom TC for Doom 2 inspired by games such as Diablo, Dark Souls and Strife. The mod features A Hub level progression where you complete quests, level up your stats, and upgrade your weapons while keeping Doom's run and gun gameplay.

name: Absolute Redemption
summary: Total conversion for Half-Life set in the Half-Life universe shortly after the first game. After accepting G-Man's offer, Gordon Freeman is teleported to different locales on Earth to find the 3 Telnorps, Moth like creatures Gordon released in Xen that are preventing the Xen portals from being closed. Gordon must travel and confront whoever has come into possession of the Telnorps and return to Xen to close the portals before a race known as the Zan usurp Xen and oppress it's Inhabitants.

name: Abyssus
summary: Abyssus is a fast-paced dungeon crawler, where the goal is to traverse a randomly generated series of dungeons while fighting your way past waves of increasingly potent monsters. There is a strong emphasis on immersion and atmosphere, something the 1980’s classic Rogue fell short on.

name: AbbleDabble
summary: Abble Dabble is the revolution of crossword games with classic word play with a new twist. Expand your game. It's like yoga for your mind. Moving Bonus Tiles: Crossword strategy jumps to the next level with the option of moving bonuses. Can you out-maneuver your opponent to tap the best combination of bonuses? Or play on a traditional static board choosing from several bonus patterns.

name: Abstêmia
summary: An endless chime, each second bringing you closer and closer to an imminent end. Embark on an adventure inside the familiar corridors of Eduardo's house and watch his residence slowly transfigure into something grotesque and terrifying. Good luck on your adventure, may they have mercy on your soul. And remember: the C.G.C. is watching you.

name: Abracadabrew
summary: Abracadabrew is a memory-based 1-4 player local co-op game. Cooperate with friends while using your memory to brew as many potions as you can by dawn. Gather ingredients hidden around the room while communicating and staying focused to unlock new brain-racking potion combinations.

name: ABC Search with Me: Sea Animal Pack
summary: Sea Animal Pack is a collection of dozens of additional game levels featuring sea animals that extend the fun time in the game ABC Search with Me!

name: ABC Search with Me: Zodiac Pack
summary: Zodiac Pack is a collection of dozens of additional game levels featuring zodiac symbols that extend the fun time in the game ABC Search with Me!

name: Abriss: Build to Destroy
summary: Abriss is an atmospheric physics-destruction building game. Build structures from parts to let them crash into your targets. Unlock new parts, destroy more, witness entropy at its worst in digital-brutalist cityscapes. Build to destroy.

name: Abysswalkers
summary:
Abysswalkers is a competitive and tactical trading card game.

Being inspired by Tetramaster and Hearthstone, Abysswalkers has similarities to most popular games within the genre that players may be familiar with while also bringing a fun and interesting twist to the gameplay forcing players to strategize and think a little differently than they may be used to.

Set within the Grim Syndicate universe after it was marred by the Daemon Scourge, you will be able to open packs to collect different Daemon and Rune cards to build decks for your Grim Summoner to battle and compete with other Grims that have decided to explore the forbidden wonders of the Abyssal Plane.

Collect, Trade, and Battle to prove you are the greatest Abysswalker within the ETA.

name: Absinthe
summary: A game where you just walk around the room.

name: Abyssborne
summary: Abyssborne is a dark fantasy roguelite that thrusts you into a shadowed, ever-changing dungeon, teeming with enemies, upgrades, and untold power.

name: A Brown Rabbit's Story
summary: A Brown Rabbit's Story is an interactive storybook, a text-driven adventure where your choices lead to branching paths and multiple endings. In a quiet orphanage, a boy wishes his toy rabbit to life… and together, you must face the world’s cruelties and find hope.

name: A Bite at Freddy's
summary:
A Bite at Freddy's is a bite-sized Five Nights at Freddy's experience.

Freddy Fazbear's Grill needs your help to test and repair the Freddy Fast-Food Delivery machine! Work along the restaurant manager to ensure food orders can be delivered from kitchen to customer without issue.

Complete orders, repairs, and challenges!

name: Abby Normalli in Mayhem Mansion
summary: A jazz-fueled 3D platformer where you bash, bounce, and explore a sprawling cartoon mansion. Play as Abby Normalli, a mischief-loving whirlwind with a giant hammer, and compete to collect family heirlooms in chaotic, character-packed worlds.

name: A Bad Clicker
summary: Some games are good, a few games are great, most are alright. This is not one of those games. Come explore this labyrinth of menus that make number bigger. Watch number get big, only to get small, to get big again, faster this time even!

name: Abeyance
summary: Abeyance is a roguelite, sci-fi, dungeon-crawler. Salvage wrecked starships in a gritty, post-apocalyptic world. Fight mutants and mechanized defense systems. Battle your inner demons to save your soul… and reclaim your humanity.

name: Abyssbound
summary: A dark, atmospheric action-adventure dungeon roguelite for 1–4 players. Descend into ever-shifting dungeons, guided-or manipulated-by the inner voice bound to your soul. Destroy Abyss Cores, survive collapsing realms, unlock permanent upgrades, and uncover the truth behind the awakening darkness.

name: A Bibelot: Y-Break
summary: No joke this time, I'll describe the game for what it is: - 10 levels, 3 difficulties, playable in 2 players Coop! - A Versus mode, against your enemy or friend, or against ???

name: A Building Full of Cats 2
summary: Welcome back to the world of A Building Full of Cats! In this sequel, not only will you be petting all the cats in the building, but you'll also be assisting its residents with various tasks. Can you pet all the cats and make a difference in the lives of the building's residents?

name: Absence of Light
summary: Embark on an epic journey in Absence of Light, an enchanting Action RPG set in the mesmerizing world of Cloudia. Unleash devastating attacks, uncover hidden secrets, and save the realm from darkness! Join the gaming community, master formidable combos, and claim your heroic destiny.

name: Above VR
summary:
Above is a virtual experience that place the player in the position of a stranded astronaut in space.
Join the main character in a visually stunning experience during the last minutes of his life.

name: A Ball Id
summary: A simple game where you just dodge balls and pet cats. (The balls are strong enough to kick you out of the game.)

name: Abstractpunk
summary: AbstractPunk is a wild, punk, soulslike game featuring unique collage-style graphics. Collect ice from defeated enemies, fight your way through a country engulfed in revolution, and try to find your place in broken future of the year 2004. Use happiness against your enemies. They will be happy.

name: Above the Dungeon: Frontier
summary: A blend of simulation and dungeon exploration, you will develop your territory as a Lord of the sword and magic world, recruiting and training adventurers to explore the dungeons within the territory.

name: Above the Snow
summary: Join the shelter crew, and let’s create the best Alpine resort around! Enjoy rich character stories, customize your shelter, attract and rescue alpinists, dive into hotel management, and map out trails! Grab your map, zip up your jacket, fill your thermos, and brace for the worst winter of the ’60s!

name: Abyss: The Wraiths of Eden - Collector's Edition
summary: Your fiancée has gone missing in the dark abyss of the ocean. Discover and investigate a forgotten underwater city that hides many spine-chilling secrets and supernatural forces. Find hidden objects and solve cleverly designed mini-games during your exploration of the underwater city of Eden. The collector's edition includes a bonus gameplay chapter, an integrated strategy guide, concept art and more.

name: Abyssal Shade
summary: Abyssal Shade is a deck building roguelike where you dive into a dungeon of the mind. Receives the blessings of your emotions through unique puzzles and expand your deck to protect yourself from the Shades.

name: Abrix for kids
summary: Abrix is back! The new task is to get a treasure stolen by nasty gnomes. Join it and take part in solving intriguing puzzles of this extremely engaging logical game.

name: Absym
summary: Absym is a unique rogue-souls-like that challenges you to survive between two dimensions: the decaying Nihilor and the corrupted Absymalith. Fight, explore, and use Rift Dancing to shift between worlds in real time. Every choice draws you closer to redemption... or corruption.

name: Absurdika: Rebuild
summary: Reality or madness?

name: Abaddon: Princess of the Decay
summary: Abaddon: Princess of the Decay is a great blend of Japanese horror and Lovecraftian dread. The game has an 8-bit retro aesthetic that combined with the story and gameplay captures the hopelessness and inevitability typical of Japanese curse and ghost stories, where the supernatural feels omnipotent and unstoppable.

name: A Bit of Tactics
summary: In the farms of Abitof monsters are grown for their yield of rare items. But a successful harvest is not easy, for these crops fight back. As with all creatures their hearts yearn for tactics. Use this as your advantage, progress through the dungeon defeat their boss and reap the rewards.

name: Abridge
summary: Abridge is an abstract, Sokoban puzzle game. Select pieces to move, pull and shift them around into a goal. The colorful shapes on them determine their movement and abilities. Remove them all from the board to solve these hand-crafted, challenging puzzles.

name: Abstract Tales: Techno-World
summary: Abstract Tales: Techno-World is a beat 'em up with cute cartoony characters and some action! Join Adrian, Elliott, Cindy, Canaan, and Clover and help them to reach Techno-World and save their parents before it's too late! Play with 5 different characters, use different special moves, go through 11 stages, and unleash your power!

name: About a Girl
summary: Katya has just turned 18, but her life is spiraling out of control. Now, in addition to shaping her own future, she must navigate the challenges of friendship, love, and family. Help her dive into this whirlwind of life without losing what matters most.

name: A Bone To Pick
summary: Ribsy is a skeleton, brought to life by the capricious Skeleton God. The Skeleton God is bored, and so he's set Ribsy a task- figure out who killed the pirate Captain who once owned Ribsy's bones.

name: About Elise
summary: Dive into this first person puzzle adventure and become Owen Scott to rescue your daughter Elise, who has been kidnapped by the organisation known as Kiminster Labs. By doing it, you will discover the big piece of the puzzle that is About Elise as a whole.

name: Abigail
summary: In this narrative-focused game, Abigail must navigate her splintered friend group and explore vibrant handcrafted neighborhoods, each with their unique way of playing the ubiquitous folk game Azulejo.

name: AboJam
summary: Manage your own farm in a turn-based defense game, and fend off swarming gangs with avocado towers you've grown yourself.

name: Abstractica
summary: In this fast-paced third person shooter with roguelike elements, you traverse a vast void and combat a variety of geometric shapes, to collect artistic mosaics. Because only this can fill the void around and inside of you...

name: Abandoned Hospital
summary: Control an RC car in an abandoned hospital. Capture eerie anomalies, avoid making noise, and uncover a chilling mystery—before something finds you first.

name: Abstract Dwelling
summary: 《Abstract Dwelling》 is a game that’s “just about building houses.” There’s no complicated currency system, no complex menus, and no intricate storylines.

name: Abeline Rush
summary: A scream at night and you'll take flight on this Single-player Fantasy Action Adventure through a mystical castle filled with monsters, mystery, and giant bosses. Can you force your way to the top and foil the villain's plot?

name: Abandoned Continent
summary: In this unfamiliar world full of danger, you will embark on a journey of location and engage in battles of wits and courage against various dangerous monsters.

name: Abyss Rebirth
summary: ●Game overview "The Labyrinth of the Abyss" has a depth of over 4000 layers. There is only one adventurer who challenges the labyrinth. Visit the central city of Midgard.

name: Abdicate
summary: This game captivates players with its distinctive pixel art style, crafting a fantastical realm where yellow earth meets a blue sky.

name: Abstract Wars
summary: Abstract Wars is a straight shot of adrenaline to the brain! Abstract Wars is an arcade 2D bullet-hell roguelike where you are just a tiny, but incredibly nimble ship in a universe-sized meat grinder.

name: Abyss Depth: Control
summary: A horror point and click set 2000m below the surface. Work off your debt, protect the diver, and survive the abyss—or die trying. In a world drowned by endless water.

name: Abyssal Tides
summary: Abyssal Tides is a fast-paced naval bullet-hell roguelite—pilot a sloop, stack upgrades mid-battle, and fend off 30 handcrafted enemy waves to save the world from the Void. Leap over rolling swells and crush your foes with arrows and cannon fire to rekindle humanity’s hope.

name: Abandoned Ecosystem
summary: Escape the Liminal Space is a 1–4-player co-op horror-adventure. Trapped alone in a vast, ever-shifting complex, you’ll face bizarre phenomena and eerie levels. Avoid monsters, outwit deadly hazards, and do whatever it takes to get out alive!

name: Absolute Canasta for Windows 11
summary: Canasta is an entertaining and strategic card game that requires both tactics and a bit of luck. Whether you are an advanced player or a beginner, "Absolute Canasta for Windows 11" offers you everything you need to consolidate your knowledge of Canasta or to learn it from scratch.

name: Abandoned Passage
summary: The Grandview has a history, and it wants you to be a part of it. The secrets here are not buried - they are waiting.

name: Abyss Diver
summary: Explore the abandoned city deep beneath the ocean. Gather resources before your oxygen runs out, and cooperate with your teammates amidst the threat of monstrous creatures. A cooperative underwater survival action game where a single decision can mean life or death.

name: Abhay
summary: A first-person, story-driven psychological horror game. Play as Abhay, a teenage boy searching for his missing sister in a cursed village. Face possessed villagers, uncover a sinister cult, and survive as his past and present spiral into darkness.

name: Abysm
summary: Explore the Catacombs of Portsmoor, solve puzzles, uncover the secrets that are lurking in the darkness, and save both yourself and the town above. Abysm is an atmospheric physics based puzzle game with action elements.

name: Abalone
summary: An unofficial adaptation of the board game made by French amateur developer Olivier Thill

name: Abyss Stares at You
summary: Trapped in an underwater base at the bottom of the Mariana Trench, you uncover a chilling truth: previous expeditions never returned. Solve the mystery, survive the abyss, and escape before it claims you too. A sci-fi horror where the depths hold more than just darkness.

name: Abyssal Swarm
summary: "Abyssal Swarm" is a military science fiction survivor game with different guns, drones, turrets, vehicles, and mechas. You are a member of the space special forces, fighting in the abyss against endless swarms of insects.

name: Ablaze
summary: Experience a delightful, full-of-action, 2-player local co-op adventure of Ablaze, where you'll throw and activate objects to solve puzzles, tumble over obstacles to save adorable sheep and take down Scorch, the troublemaking fire spirit.

name: Abyssus
summary: Gather your friends and dive into Abyssus' fast-paced multiplayer shooting action. Fight through gorgeous hand-crafted levels in a roguelite adventure that will put your tactical skills to the ultimate test. Wield powerful brine-powered weapons and refit them with ancient technologies to gain an edge over your foes. Obtain divine blessings to enhance your firepower with elemental and mystic effects.

name: Absolution of the Dead
summary: The Soviets have released a hell upon Europe. You wake up in a zombie infested hotel, the only way out is down into the chaos of the undead. Loot, craft, and upgrade your zombie slaughtering arsenal to make it out alive....

name: Abrams Battle Tank
summary:
Frontline heat. Behind the gun of an M1A1.

0400 Hours: Mission Briefing, Soviet FST-1's and BMP's are pouring over the border into West Germany. Ready your crew and move out!

0415 Hours: Choose the right weapons. Reconnaissance reports aircraft and infantry, too, so balance your load of Sabots, HEAT rounds and AX's.

0500 Hours: Patrol the road to Bonn. Only minor clashes so far. Check your NAV map and damage screen. You have enough fuel to weed out the recon units, but will your ammo hold out?

1045 Hours: The heat is on. Your 120mm gun slams you against the seat as you blast another T-80. Gutted tanks litter the battlefield, pillars of smoke streak the sky, but the enemy keeps rolling. You swing your turret around and spot a Soviet assault chopper. His sights are on you.

2230 Hours: Get home alive. Cross the bridge and you're home free. You're glued to the gunner's sights, straining to detect enemy movement with thermal imaging. The ballistic computer locks on. Range 1326m. Pray he's alone.

name: Abducted
summary: You have woken in a strange place and have no idea how you got there. Your goal is to find a way out but don't get caught or else you may never see the light of day again.

name: Abyssus: Brinehunter Pack
summary: Show the style and swagger of the true Brinehunter with Abyssus' first Cosmetic Pack!

name: Abcdef
summary:
Press ABCDEF. Tie your fingers into knots.

Press the A,B,C,D,E,F keys to extend your sticks and navigate your cube across four stages to the goal.

name: Abs vs. The Blood Queen
summary: The first single-player Killer Queen experience comes home! Abs vs. The Blood Queen is a frantic 2D platformer built directly on top of the Killer Queen Arcade engine. Run, fly, and slay your way through the undead horde as you head towards a fated showdown with the terrifying Blood Queen!

name: A Bouquet of My Beloveds
summary: Sekai Project will release Cosmillica's "A Bouquet of My Beloveds" (Subete no Koi ni, Hanabata wo.), a yuri visual novel, in English for PC via Steam.

name: A Blade for the Emperor
summary: An interactive fiction epic fantasy.

name: Absentia
summary: Absentia is a first-person psychological survival horror game. As Ethan Blake gets captured in the 1940s he finds himself waking in a cell from an abandoned castle. Ethan recognizes the town however he appears to be the only living person in there. Use Stealth and Intelligence to survive.

name: Absolute Silence: A Game Album
summary: Absolute Silence is an experimental album of lo-fi abstract games.

name: A Bad Game of Football
summary: Classic RTS and Football meet in this explosive 1v1 game. Control all your players at once or separately in stadiums full of dangers for your players to avoid. Tackle, foul, and baseball bat your way to victory, just don’t get spotted by the referee…

name: Absolute-Full-Life
summary: Colourful survival horror first-person shooter with manual weapon reloading and a mystery environment. Discover every secrets in an open world full of diverse enemies and hidden locations.

name: Abandoned Places 2
summary:
In this dungeon-crawling RPG you must assemble a team of four brave fighters to launch an attack on Pendugmalhe, and save the kingdom of Kalynthia. The main gameplay is influenced by Dungeon Master, but features sections in the open air battling bears as well as the dungeons. 
 
In the real-time combat sections you must choose weapons and spells instantaneously, using the mouse-based interface. You will find many villages along the way, and you can gain clues and buy supplies at these. The game's difficulty is pitched at experienced role-players; ideally those with an experienced party from the first game to load in.

name: Abiko the Miko 2
summary: Japanese female shaman fight against "yokai"! This is an exciting action game with a 16-bit taste!

name: Abyss
summary: Take on the greatest futuristic, apocalypse adventure with Abyss.Are you ready to save the world, from the invading creatures? Prove it in Abyss: The Training has Begun, by Axid Studios.

name: Abducted: The Night Hunters
summary: Nobody know when it started, people began to disappear all arround the country, it escalated quickly to cases of mass disappearances around the entire world. Communications started to fail and so did our leaders, it was over before we knew it.

name: Absolution
summary: Absolution is a first-person psychological horror experience where you face THE JUDGE as they peel apart your very soul. Uncover dark truths and navigate moral dilemmas as you're questioned about your past deeds. Every lie has consequences.

name: Abstract Initiative
summary: Abstract Initiative is a first person platformer with an emphasis on movement based puzzles. You will be given the ability to forcefully move and manipulate objects with the prototype EMG tool. All experiments will be conducted in the newly built offshore test rooms, these challenging environments will require you to be resourceful and innovative

name: ABC Kids Bundle
summary: An excellent introduction for children to learning writing, counting, improving motor and visual skills.

name: Abyssal Maw
summary: Control a sootball to hunt for the insatiable Abyssal Maw. Slay monsters, haul corpses with sootball, earn Corrupted Bone Shards. Trade for upgrades. Survive chaos challenges like lightning storms. As feeding escalates, mutations worsen—balance risks to sustain your fragile survival loop.

name: Abberbury
summary: Enter the dungeon of a medieval castle full of traps, enemies, mysteries! Can you overcome all obstacles to justice?

name: A Bike Ride to the Creek
summary: I lived in rural North Carolina during my elementary school years, and loved to explore the forests, ponds, and trails that surrounded my neighborhood. These places are all but gone now due to encroaching development, so making a game that retraces the trail to the creek has been a way for me to preserve and revisit some really happy childhood memories.

name: Above the Cloud: Time Bound Mansion
summary: Uncover the mysteries of the mansion in this co-op classless Action RPG. Permanently unlock abilities, gear and relics to create your perfect class fantasy. Step into the nightmare of the Time-Bound and defeat its denizen to progress and uncover the fate of the estate.

name: Abasralsa
summary: Find out the story of a simple crazy Vlad who lies on his bed imagines a crazy journey.

name: A Bunch of you in a Crowded Room
summary: it helps to talk to yourself

name: Abelina
summary: Explore a surreal wilderness by platforming and use timing based hits to gather resources. Break open branching paths to get to the other side of a giant world, talk to it's strange inhabitants, and try to understand the nature of this world.

name: Abyss Unleashed
summary: Abyss Unleashed is a 1-4 player action platformer RPG set on a lonely island. Powerful bosses with diverse patterns await your challenge. Experience intense boss battles through precise control and strategic gameplay.

name: Abunai Koi no Sousashitsu
summary: A visual novel released in 2012 for PSP.

name: Abyssal Acres
summary: Abyssal Acres is a ~pixel rogue-lite strategy game with a side view, where for some reason you need to develop a demon settlement in Hell, process the souls of sinners, defend against the attack of the forces of light and do a few other things and so on and so on...

name: Abduction Bit
summary: Abduction Bit is a NES-like arcade based on elements of some timeless classics from 80's (Bubble Bobble, Ice Climber, Mario Bros).

name: Abyssal Echo
summary: Abyssal Echo is a stylized third-person adventure game. Players awaken in a world of absolute darkness, exploring their surroundings by emitting visualized sound waves. Players must evade horrible creatures, collect a sufficient number of items, and ultimately escape from the extraction point.

name: Abyss Lord
summary: What awaits the young man in the future? A long and happy life next to loved ones? Losses and suffering leading to an inglorious death? The throne of the enemy of humanity? A harem of all sorts of races, from pretty goblins to graceful vampires? The one and only love until death?

name: Abyss Knights
summary: Abyss Knights is an upcoming action RPG currently under development.

name: Abyssus Deep Under
summary:
Theme:
Abyssus Deep Under transports players into an underwater world, where the mysteries of the deep ocean await exploration and conquest. The game’s setting combines the allure of the unknown with the strategic demands of resource management and territorial expansion.

Genre:
This game is a blend of 4X (explore, expand, exploit, exterminate) and Real-Time Strategy (RTS), offering a unique mix of long-term strategic planning and real-time tactical combat. Players manage resources, develop technologies, and engage in underwater battles.

Abyssus Deep Under offers a deep, immersive experience with a nostalgic touch, inspired by classic 90s 3D isometric graphics. The game is available on both PC and mobile platforms, ensuring accessibility for a wide range of players.

name: Abyssdia
summary: Abyssdia is a fantasy action RPG by Ring Games and published by NHN. Become a Tuner who restores order to a world corrupted by the Abyss Slit, lead a four-member squad in real-time battles and giant-boss raids, unleash the signature Harmonic Strike, and deepen bonds through meal dates that unlock story moments. Sleek anime-style 3D and fast character-switching combat deliver a crisp, satisfying fight feel.

name: Abathor: Atlantis Landing
summary: Play Abathor Atlantis Landing and relive the glory of arcades in this action platformer for up to 4 players.

name: AboFlah-intelliFinish
summary: Puzzle game on a difficult level. Start disassembling and assembling puzzles to reach the finish line

name: Abyss Kitchen
summary: Abyss Kitchen is a survival action game in which you play the role of Lop a cook who accompanies a party of adventurers, and guides them with the power of food. Feed yourself in the dungeon and eat whatever you can to keep from starving and falling down. Eat up anything that stands in your way!

name: Abyssal Blade
summary: Abyssal Blade is a 2D, pixel-art "strategic" boss rush inspired by difficult mechanics in high-level MMO raids. You awaken as the Wanderer, now strong enough to confront your sorrow—with only 1 HP, conquer the five stages of grief and escape the abyss.

name: Aberrate Inc.
summary: Aberrate inc. is an upcoming 3D box-and-button puzzle game where the fabric of reality bends—and breaks—at your command. Harness the power to ABERRATE, splitting batteries into two coloured copies. Manipulate phased objects to solve puzzles, unlock new areas, and discover the world of Aberrate inc.!

name: Abettor
summary: Abettor is a top-down shooter where enemies constantly spawn all around you. In this game, not only does the world generate around you, but the enemies do as well. Kill as many enemies and achieve your highest score. How many can you kill in Abettor?

name: Abnormal Status: Tattoo, Prohibited Books, Parasites
summary: In the present day, the majority of the human race has become capable of using magic. The sudden rise of this power has not been met with adequate laws and regulations, and the world is rapidly becoming a wasteland as crimes and discrimination intensify.

name: ABD: A Beautiful Day
summary: ABD: A Beautiful Day is an MMORTSS (Massively Multiplayer Online Real Time Survival Strategy) that spans from 100,000 B.C.E. to 245 B.C.E..  Play ABD in a 24 hour, 7 days a week continuous environment to build your civilization, play with friends, and battle exposure in the process.

name: Absconder
summary: Absconder is a fast-paced game about quick decisions and limited vision. In this top-down action runner, you are escaping from the compound of a totalitarian regime. Use every shortcut, find every hidden passage to reach the edge of the city before your pursuers catch up to you.

name: Abuzittin'in Maceraları III: "O Şimdi Mafya" Part: 1
summary:
This game starts in fullscreen. "Çıkış" in the menu or Alt+F4 shortcut will exit the game.

In the intro, the developer states that the game "is sutiable for all ages".

Full Turkish solution of the game and a Turkish trailer can be found in Extras.

name: Abyss Protection
summary: Abyss Protection - dynamic, endless Tower Defense. Fight off the attacks of the inhabitants of the abyss, expand your possessions. Build formidable weapons that will help repulse enemies. Defeat the main evil.

name: A Bit Tied Up
summary:
A hero's journey isn't one of constant victory; Thalius knows that extremely well. But he's never down for the count for long. Whenever he's captured by his arch-nemesis Xinali, he's able to use his wiles to piece together clues from the villainous mage's evil monologues in order to get back on his feet.

Except...Thalius didn't get much sleep last night. So when he wakes up with his arms bound to a dungeon wall at the very end of the speech with a menacing silhouette walking away from him, he's kind of at a loss.

name: Absolute Supercars
summary: From the racing minds at Eutechnyx comes the definitive auto package for every hardcore driving fan's wildest dreams: Absolute Supercars! This racing game allows people of all ages and skill to get behind the wheels of some of the world's most powerful supercars. Take part in quick races, time trials, championships and even an epic Career mode in an attempt to earn the big bucks and fill your Showroom with a cavalcade of stunning motors! From Ferrari, to Pagani, to Aston Martin and McLaren, there's a car for everyone and a series of stunning tracks to race them on.

name: ABC Book 3D: Learn English
summary: ABC Book 3D is a fun educational game that will not only entertain your child, but also teach them to identify, recognize and pronounce letters, their names, phonetics and even basic words.

name: A Broken Tale
summary:
A Broken Tale is a commercial game made by a small Norwegian indie studio(NoLoot studios. It is inspired by 90's classics like South Park, Zelda a Link to the past, Banjo & Kazooie and Conker Bad fur day. It's a original game with custom art, music and graphics. It used to be a RPG Maker project but we decided to make in an official indie title in a stronger game engine instead. The game is a musical comedy action lite rpg adventure game. It's 2D-top down like Zelda for SNES. The graphic and animations are inspired by Southpark (animations), Conker and Banjo & Kazooie.

The game takes off where most games end. The big villain has been defeated, the hero have won. But the "The End" screen has not yet blocked the heavens, so you as one of the bad guys are searching for a new villain. The game breaks the fourth wall heavily and all of the characters are aware that they are video game characters.

It's open a open world you first travel trough throughout the main story, but you can always backtrack for side-quests and exploration.

We have no official release date, but the game is very much still in development. It has been for soon to be five years now.

Here is a little teaser trailer from when we updated the game engine ->

name: Absorber
summary: Absorber: An addictive idle RPG adventure in which you absorb the strength and abilities of defeated enemies. Explore a fantasy world, defeat challenging enemies. Immerse yourself in the unique gameplay. Will you rise to become the ultimate absorber?

name: Abduction
summary: Abduction is a singleplayer psychological horror experience. When unexpected visitors arrive in the middle of the night, you must defend your farm in order to take back your land.

name: Abyssal Drift
summary: Explore abyssal mazes as a jellyfish in a retro 1-bit puzzle — find the key, unlock the door, and dive ever deeper.

name: Abyss Raiders: Uncharted
summary: Abyss Raiders: Uncharted is an action tower defence game, set in a future where robots are the dominant species in the universe. You will need to survive waves of fierce enemies whilst searching for the ancient ruins that have the power to prevent the second apocalypse.

name: A Boring Place: The Road 2 Head
summary: Don't move, it's around here somewhere

name: Abyssus Scroll
summary: A simple mini-game where you play as an Octaly exploring the world of Abyssus while trying to escape from the tentacle of the terrifying Kraken!

name: Absurbia: A Trashy Satire of Suburban Outcries
summary: An experimental sound novel all about spreading the cancer of transgression and trash. Read through the annals of human excrement that glorifies the worst of humanity. Nothing can save this underground Cult Abomination! Be anointed by utter anarchic depravity from every hole of your wet body!

name: Abyss Crew
summary: Abyss Crew is a cooperative submarine game set in a steampunk universe. An underwater cooperative roguelike that allows 1 to 4 players to assume the roles of the Pilot, the Sonar Operator, the Gunner, and the Engineer.

name: Above: Colonies of the Mist
summary: Build a hilltop colony in the last land safe from the toxic mist. Survive, expand, explore ancient monuments, and look for a way out before the mist claims everything.

name: A Busy Day for Elmo: Sesame Street Video Calls
summary:
This is an app of video messages from Elmo about seven fun and familiar preschool topics that he’s learning about during his daily routines. 
 
Elmo’s got a busy day in store and he wants to share it with you! “Elmo’s Busy Day…Video Calls from Sesame Street” inspires kids to get out and about with fourteen video messages from Elmo about topics like animals, reading, healthy habits and more. Tap objects in Elmo’s room to watch and listen as Elmo travels around his colorful neighborhood, sharing things he’s learning and loving on the way.

name: Abyss: New Dawn
summary: Dive into the enchanting world of Abyss: New Dawn - A cozy game that combines farming, town-building, and adventure in which you explore the ancient wonders with many mysterious Abyss floors alone or with your friends.

name: About Fishing
summary: Cast your line into calm waters and feel the quiet pull beneath the surface. Each cast brings rewards, but some things you reel in were never meant to be found.

name: A Bibelot: Tiret sur Will
summary: This is your average precision platformer. Playable in 4 player Coop, a choice to have a speedrun timer for well, speedrunners, tons (maybe an exaggeration) of secrets and places to go out of bounds, tons of achievements, tons of CRT scanlines, and maybe, tons of fun?

name: Absence of Light
summary: "Absence of Light" is an exploration based shoot 'em up that combines intense bullet-dodging combat with a metroidvania-style level design. Solve, shoot, and shine your way through the kingdom of Luminaria and reawaken the light!

name: Abyss Ring
summary: Survive, cook, and conquer the depths! In this survival roguelike, cook monsters to stave off hunger through 100 floors of dungeons. With over 200 equipment and randomly generated dungeon, every playthrough offers fresh challenges and endless possibilities.

name: Aboxcalipse
summary: Aboxcalipse is a 3D top‑down cooperative game for up to 2 players where you play as a stock clerk in a zombie‑infested warehouse. Gather materials, assemble boxes and load them onto the truck, using them as weapons and traps to face clumsy zombies in each level.

name: Abi and the soul
summary: Abi is a girl who wakes up lost and without memory on a magical island, but finds a small celestial light that will accompany her in this wonderful adventure of love and friendship. She discovers the mystery of the island and recovers all your memories.

name: Abiotic Factor
summary: Abiotic Factor is a survival crafting experience for 1-6 players set in the depths of an underground research facility. Caught between paranormal containment failure, a military crusade, and chaos from a dozen realms, the world’s greatest minds must survive against the universe’s biggest threats.

name: Abyss Chaser
summary: Hunt demons as a biker rebel angel in this action-packed rogue-like dungeon crawler. Ride through Forsaken Lands and chase your enemies to the Depths of Hell using blades, guns, spells and support of otherworldly patrons.

name: Abel
summary: An uncanny liminal space themed walking-simulator.

name: Abulia
summary: Abulia is an Type-write battle RPG and Visual Novel adventure based on the mind of a special girl that is trying to find herself in the world and struggling to understand our complex world.

name: Abomination Tower
summary: Abomination Tower is a humorously macabre, 2D procedurally generated platformer.

name: Abobo's Big Adventure
summary: Abobo's Big Adventure is a freeware parody Flash game. Inspired by various video games released for the Nintendo Entertainment System, the game features Abobo, a boss character from the Double Dragon franchise, traveling through the worlds of several different games to save his son. Developed by I-Mockery founder Roger Barr, Abobo's Big Adventure was released in January 2012 to positive critical reception.

name: About an Elf
summary: Explore 4 magical, mysterious lands. Decipher indecipherable crystal visions! Fight an assortment of evil monsters, each more monstrous than the last! About an Elf is a point-and-click-ish, RPG-ish, visual-novel-ish game of gigantawesome proportions. Do you have what it takes to have what it takes?

name: A Bright Light in the Middle of the Ocean
summary: climb to the top of a lighthouse, watch the sunset, look at the stars

name: Abaddon
summary: A Gothic horror FPS where you die in one hit. Battle the undead and servants of Abaddon in a new FPS built with old technology.

name: Abashed
summary: Abashed is a 2.5D narrative-driven side-scrolling game that lets you explore the life of Issac, a man living with psychosis. One day waking up all alone, he sets out to find the truth behind his missing partner. On the way he finds himself needing to confront his deepest fears and the darkest secrets. Join Issac in this story of love, loss, fear, and acceptance. Reality is not what it seems.

name: Abyssal Anarchy
summary: A fast-paced co-op spell-hell where each map pulls you deeper into the Abyss. Choose from 5 heroes and 14 spells, unlock upgrades, and survive alone or with friends as the magic grows wilder with every descent.

name: Abyssopelagic
summary: Abyssopelagic is a first person atmospheric horror game set at the bottom of the Europian ocean where valuable resources are to be found, but have they gone too deep?

name: Abzu
summary: Abzu is an exploration game where you are a lone diver in a lush ocean world. The diver descends deeper and deeper into the depths, where she will encounter majestic creatures, discover ancient secrets, and search for her true purpose. Abzu roughly translates to "The Ocean of Wisdom" from ancient Sumerian.

name: Absum
summary: Ethan Cross hasn’t heard from his mother in weeks. He decides to check on her at the family home but what he finds is silence, locked doors, and rooms that feel wrong. Trapped in a decaying house bound to a cursed clock. Explore, survive, and uncover what time has forgotten.

name: Abnormal
summary:
A horror from distant past. 
 
Will awaken tonight. 
 
Do you dare face something Abnormal? 
 
Abnormal is a first person horror game made in the spirit of classical horror titles where the emphasis was making the player feel vulnerable and in real danger as opposed to the current trend of overpowering the player with weapons and resources and sending hordes of zombies after him. In Abnormal your character has asthma and therefore you have to keep looking for inhalers as you run out of breath from physical activities or from the horrors in this mansion. In addition to that, Abnormal features the ability to instantly switch between two different time periods in the mansion you are exploring which will come in handy for puzzle solving. 
 
Abnormal will feature optional support for Head Mounted Displays such as Oculus Rift and HTC Vive which will immerse you in the heart of fear.

name: Abzu: Deluxe Edition
summary: The Abzu: Deluxe Edition brings together the soundtrack and game into one amazing package and at one amazing price! With this bundle you get the full, cinematic soundtrack and the full, majestic game for 25% less than purchasing each separately.

name: Abandoned
summary: Abandoned is a survival horror game set in an abandoned building with authentic abandoned building exploration. To survive you must find all the keys in order to escape while avoiding the creatures that lurk within.

name: About a Boy
summary: “About a Boy” immerses players in a narrative-driven journey set in a future city devoid of humanity as we know it. Through the eyes of Miro, a boy with the unique ability to perceive people based on their animal temperaments, players embark on a puzzle point-and-click adventure.

name: Abyss Saga
summary: In the heart of the continent lies the deep pit called Abyss, rumor says there is boundless knowledge and immeasurable wealth. As a traveler who has stumbled into Abyss, you will build a team with diverse companions to navigate the Abyss, explore its deepest layers, and unearth the ultimate truth...

name: Absolutely Nothing
summary: Absolutely Nothing is a (game?) about absolutely nothing, and it is the pinnacle of minimalistic puzzle non-game design rivaling modern AAA titles.

name: Absinth
summary:
Absinth is a psychological horror-thriller by indie developer blackHound Studios. Explore the chilling world of Zane Zaminsky and discover the unsettling events of his past.

It is a weekend in late July 2018 when Zane visits the US California Redwoods only to disappear without a trace shortly after arrival. Two days later, the local Police Department locates Zane on the main road near the Redwoods after receiving an anonymous tip. Chief Inspector Carter opens the investigation a few hours later, only to discover that not only does Zane have no recollection of the past two days, but the fact that he has a daughter has been completely wiped from his memory. As the investigation unfolds, more and more clues surface to suggest Zane’s past hides more than just the answer to his amnesia.

Experience what happened to Zane and how his life changed overnight. Hide from the unknown and try to distinguish between reality and illusion. Solve dimension-unraveling riddles to reach your targets and uncover the intrigue which brought Zane’s life to ruin. Decipher secret documents to expose the truth and win against your own mind to survive. Use the innovative AR glass to analyze your environment and constantly find new ways to avoid the encounter with the devious AI.

Absinth takes you to a world of fear, darkness, and loss, but also hope. The duplicitous presentation of scenes combined with the classic dark atmosphere will have your emotions twisted and in a constant state of heightened adrenaline. Experience unique storytelling and the innovative machinations of Absinth from a real indie developer studio in a way you’ve never played before.

name: AbyssalRestaurant
summary: You will play as a tavern owner in a fantasy world, entertaining guests, shopping at the market, cooking yourself, fully customizing your own delicious (and possibly peculiar) recipes, and promoting your shop and dishes to more friends~ (with lots of physics in the game)

name: A Beauty Cold and Austere
summary:
That survey course in conceptual mathematics seemed like a good idea at the start of the term - no graded homework, no midterm exams - just an oral final at the end. 
 
But now that final is tomorrow morning. After months of procrastination you've got one night left to learn enough to pass the course. 
 
You might even be desperate enough to try one of your roommate's sketchy memory pills.

name: Abe VR
summary:
ABE VR is an intense experience that recreates the horrifying story about a misguided robot seeking the unconditional love of humans…at whatever cost.

Created in Unreal Engine, and continuing our filmmaking in virtual reality, ABE VR is based on ABE the multi-award winning short film, and planned feature film, written and directed by Rob McLellan.

No longer do you have to just watch the film, you now get to experience it as a character. Specifically, ABE’s chosen victim.

name: Abyssey
summary:
Abyssey is a strategy log-like game with Pixel Horizontal Scroll View!
Get jewelry and get a job! You get one job depending on the jewelry you're wearing!
Depending on your job, you will be able to use your own basic attacks and skills!
There are a total of 16 jobs, and you can experience new plays every time!
You can also gain item synergies, and item synergies can earn additional skills and stats to complement your job skills!
You can strengthen your items to make your current skills and synergy stronger!
There are more than 60 items. Try combine them in a variety of ways!
And, Beat enemies and bosses by creating my own synergy combination!

name: Abyss World
summary: Abyss World is a third-person ARPG game. Players will explore the "Old Tide" in the vast Nornidia land, explore its secrets, challenge the threats in the underworld, experience different stories, and write their own epic tale of adventure.

name: Abracadabra
summary: Abracadabra is a simple arcade game starring a young wizard who has to collect keys in the maze-filled wizard’s castle while using a projectile spell to vanquish different enemies such as snakes and elves. One of the features of the environment are the constantly changing walls, ie the individual blocks of the walls change their position as you make your way through. There is also a time limit, failing to exit a room under the given time results in an untimely death. A two-player option is available where two players can take turns and see who collects the highest amount of points.

name: A Bird Story
summary: A Bird Story is a simple, surreal short about a boy and a bird with a broken wing. Its sole purpose is to tell a story, and can be viewed as a narrative/animation with interactivity -- but without a line of dialogue. It is a standalone game with its own beginning and endings; but for those who's played To the Moon, the boy eventually grows up to become the next patient in the series.

name: Abyssia
summary:
태초에 신들에게서 추방당한 신. 
선과 악 그 어느쪽에도 속하지 안았던 어비시아(심연)은 기억 저멀리 사라졌다. 
 
오랜 시간이 지난 후 인간들은 신의 존재를 연구했지만, 
신들은 인간들의 경외의 대상이기만 했지, 자신들의 지식을 쉽사리 알려주지 않았다. 
하지만, 어비시아는 "금단의 서고"를 만들었고, 어디선가 신의 지식, 금단의 지식이 
있는 "어비시아 대서고"가 존재한다는 소문이 돌기 시작했다. 
 
초대받은 자만이 출입할 수 있는 곳. 
 
지금 당신도 어비시아의 비밀을 파해치기 위해 출발하세요. 
 
"어비시아"는 무료 플레이가 가능합니다.

name: A Bottled Up Island
summary: A Bottled Up Island is a short 3D-Platformer built around momentum, speed and exploration. Break bottles that contain chunks of a floating island to complete the game world, either solo or with friends.

name: A Bug's Life
summary:
Based on the Disney/Pixar 3D animated film, you must guide Flik as he sets out to find a group of warrior insects to help his colony of ants to fight off the hungry grasshoppers.

Unlike the other versions of this game, the GBC version is a 2D side-scroller. You must guide Flik in finding parts for his inventions. Along the way, you must avoid other enemy insects, including the grasshoppers, or hit them with berries.

name: Abandoned
summary: You wake up in a house, not knowing who or where you are or how you got there. First thing is to try and figure out how to get out. And while doing so...is what you are seeing real? Play to find out.

name: Absolute Insanity
summary: Armed with a diverse arsenal of weapons battle through ever-changing mazes and confront eerie, evolving enemies in a pulse-pounding survival horror action-packed experience.

name: Abmis the Lion
summary: Abmis the Lion, King of the Beasts, has a problem: all of his kingdom's potatoes have been stolen, without which his citizens may starve! You control his navigation through a side-view platform maze avoiding animal hazards and collecting dropped potatoes, using objects you find along the way, all in pursuit of the foxy thief. Once all a level's potatoes have been collected, a magical door will open permitting access to the next level.

name: Abacus
summary: Explore a mysterious and whimsical world in this retro 2D platformer-shooter, featuring cute pixel graphics, a catchy original soundtrack and swarms of explosive bees!

name: Abismo
summary: Abismo is a deep-sea co-op horror game set on the abyssal floor of an alien planet. Descend alone or with up to three friends into shifting trenches, recover classified research, and survive the crushing dark while uncovering an analog-horror mystery buried in corrupted VHS tapes.

name: ABC Follow Me: Animals
summary: An educational game for preschool children that will develop their motor skills and introduce them to the basics of writing letters and numbers in a child-friendly design. Once this is mastered, you can move on to a more challenging game mode where children learn animals from A to Z in English!

name: Abyss Fantasia
summary: The city "Cynthia" on the edge of the abyss, the "missing" girl who didn't know where she came from began to step into the abyss. Experience the complex emotional, mysterious biological environment under the Abyss. Finally face the deepest darkness of the abyss.

name: Absurdistan
summary:
Absurdistan is a partially text-based, side-scrolling adventure game featuring simplistic graphics.

You play as Leszek, a young Absurdani, who, just like his family, is fed up with the regime imposed by the Party. But, dear Adventure Gamer, fear nothing! Despite the seemingly gloomy setting, the game doesn't intend to get you down, as its main goal is to poke fun at many absurdities of the daily life in a totalitarian-communist state.

The game features a whole variety of puzzles, which, unlike the state of Absurdistan, do make sense. Some of them may even require you to grab something to write and figure them out in real life.

name: Absolute Drift
summary: In Absolute Drift, you will master the art of drifting. Practice your skills in Free-Roam and compete in drift events such as Driftkhana and Mountain Drifting.

name: Abyss Veil
summary: Abyss Veil is a narrative FPS where you play as Ivy and Mel. One seeks her brother, the other revenge. Meet strange folks, fight like hell, unravel strange mysteries, and most importantly, enjoy your stay!

name: Abrez
summary: Abrez is a fast-paced shooting game where you aim at colored cans. Some cans increase your score, while others decrease it. Shoot at coins to buy special balls: single, triple, or explosive. Each level lasts 3 minutes!

name: Absolute Territory
summary: Engage in futuristic space dogfights against large warships and enemy starfighters. Manage Newtonian flight physics and power settings, outwit and eliminate hostiles, and survive through hazardous mine and asteroid fields. Gripping action across the campaign and leaderboard game modes.

name: Above The Horizon
summary: Above The Horizon is terraformation survival crafting game where you crash landed above the planet "Lunaris". The rest of your colonization team landed safely on the planet... so it's up to you to get back to the planet and terraform it along the way!

name: Absolver
summary: Absolver is an online multiplayer combat RPG where players are placed behind the mask of a Prospect under control of the Guides, the new rulers of the fallen Adal Empire, who have placed you here to determine your worth in joining their elite corps of Absolvers.

name: Abdogtion
summary: Some creepy presence lurks deep in the snowy mountains. Locals have been experiencing a series of strange abductions, but none of them were brave enough to do anything. Until the day our main protagonist lost his dog. Powered by little more than his fists, he's determined to break through the frozen wastes into the heart of the forest just to get his best friend back.

name: Abduction Prologue: The Story Of Jonathan Blake
summary: In this survival horror game, play as Jonathan Blake who is awaken at night to find that he is not alone. Work your way through the apartment and try to survive your attempted ABDUCTION.

name: Abyssfall: Seekers Within
summary: Seek the truth behind a millennia-old tower's existence as you navigate its ever-changing floors and confront its strange and fantastical denizens in this character-driven roguelike RPG, where grid-based combat meets fast-paced action.

name: Abyssal Trench
summary: Abyssal Trench is a first-person underwater horror game where you play as a lone explorer waking from cryo-sleep after a failed mission. With your pod out of fuel and your crew gone, a mysterious AI voice guides you to collect data from three abandoned drilling sites deep beneath the ocean.

name: Abyssal Reflections
summary: Abyssal Reflections is short Atmospheric depressing "non-jumpscare" game where you go through a total of 8 different time periods. You'll have to take care of your owners and how you relate to them is up to you.

name: Abject Abyss
summary: Abject Abyss is a first person horror adventure on a distant world. Explore Luminary Corporation’s most advanced research facility while piecing together what went wrong, and avoiding the horrors that lurk in the dark.

name: Absolute Force Online
summary: Absolute Force Online is a first-person shooting game, which is the first in China to make use of the Unreal 3 Engine. Players can take on the roles of hardened mercenaries, either the fiendish Rotten Angels or the honorable Hands of Justice. They are able to use advanced weapons and military vehicles (aircraft and tanks) to fight battles in famous locations, mysterious islands, and modern cities from all around the world. There will also be campaign modes featured, where you can fight alongside your teammates against infected zombies and other dangerous enemies.

name: Abunai Koi no Sousashitsu: Eternal Happiness
summary: A sequel to Otome game from PSP called "Abunai Koi ☆ no Sousashitsu" released for the PlayStation Vita.

name: Abandoned Places: A Time for Heroes
summary:
In this RPG, you play the role of four heroes whose mission is to save their world, Kalynthia, from the evil arch mage Bronagh. Most of the time, while exploring the over world, the game is shown in a 2D top-down view. It gives you much freedom: there's more to do than just stick to the main quest. Towns have a static interface where you reach the wished location by pressing the according symbol. e.g. a church for healing up or a sage for hints.

During dungeon crawls the game switches to a 3D view and plays similar to Dungeon Master. As usual for this kind of games you see the dungeon in a small windows while your characters are shown on the right hand side of the screen. Dungeon sequences are completely in real-time. This includes combat which basically consists of clicking on a character's weapon or magic spell and then clicking on the monster. After every usage of a weapon/spell you have to wait a certain time until you can use it again.

name: Abyss Vaulter
summary: You've fallen down a sinkhole. Oh no! Luckily for you a gun has fallen on your head and balloons seem to be friendly. Ascend the abyss and escape these depths.

name: Absolum
summary: Crafted with passion by the dream team that redefined side-scrolling beat 'em ups, Absolum mixes top-of-the-class combat action with modern roguelite elements, bringing all the vibes of the fantasy arcade hits of the past into an immersive adventure set in the original world of Talamh.

name: Abyss Eschaton Survivors
summary: Conquer layered dreams, battle the Abyssal Lord's minions, gather Dream Essence! In this roguelike action game, forge heroes in the Dream Sanctuary by collecting gear, upgrading skills, confronting the Abyssal Lord. "Even fate won't deter you, My Lord? Break the cursed cycle. I'll light your path.”

name: Above Snakes
summary: Piece by piece, create your own world and survive in this Wild West-inspired survival RPG. Craft, farm, hunt, build your base, and fight in order to stay alive.

name: Abodtion
summary:
The incedenst require you to move out.

Let's start unpacking stuff and cozy up our new abode!

name: Abomi Nation: Monster Rifts
summary: Battle teams of Abomis in this turn-based roguelike monster-tamer where the matchups change every run! Recruit creatures from several different indie universes to help close the rifts destroying Abomi Nation. Create your own Abomis or download others from Steam Workshop for infinite possibilities

name: Abducted
summary:
Abducted by aliens and taken thousands of light years from home, you have one ultimate goal: Escape. But you have so many unanswered questions… How did you get here? What is this place? Who took you and why?

There are a few things you learn right away. You’re clearly somewhere in deep space, one look at the starfield and asteroids drifting by outside the window makes that pretty clear. And then there’s this device implanted in your arm, how did it get there? Who put it there? You can have conversations with it, explore its functionality, it can even help you fight hostile aliens and control the environment.

If you want to survive and get away from this place, you’ll have to solve these mysteries and others.

name: Abyss
summary: Taking inspiration from Rengoku for the PSP, Armored Core and Blame!, ABYSS is a third person shooter duel game featuring randomly generated guns and enemies. How deep can you descend into the ABYSS?

name: Abyss School
summary: Solve hidden items and puzzles while avoiding abyssal zombies and traps at school.

name: Absinthia
summary: Absinthia is a turn-based RPG that explores themes of love, loss, betrayal and acceptance as four close friends fight to protect their home.

name: A Box Full of Joy
summary: A grim and surreal adventure game.

name: Ablepsia
summary: Game about a blind old man. Who includes street lights. Because the whole world is in darkness. The blind man can only stop, using the space bar. Help him to lighten the dark cities. Avoiding obstacles using the left mouse button.

name: Abyss of Dungeons
summary: Abyss of Dungeons is a Fantasy Extraction RPG. Players will embark on a daring journey in this PvPvE experience where they will vanquish cunning adventurers and monsters while exploring dungeons consumed by an encroaching darkness. As players delve deeper, treasures hidden within the shadows will promise unparalleled wealth and power, waiting for the bravest souls to claim their riches.

name: A Bewitching Revolution
summary:
A Bewitching Revolution is a first-person adventure game about a communist witch living in a cyberpunk city. Use magic to help the city's residents build collective forms of power and resistance!

Inspired by the work of Silvia Federici, A Bewitching Revolution tells an optimistic story about people transforming their gloomy capitalist present into a bright revolutionary future. It is designed to be played in a single sitting, roughly one hour long.

name: A Bots Color Adventure
summary: Collect orbs, defeat enemies, and explore colorful worlds.

name: A Bad Christmas Story
summary: Christmas lights, winter snow, and a serial killer on the loose. Follow a gifted detective through a twisted holiday night in this story-driven, interactive horror game. Your choices determine who lives, and who dies. Can you outsmart the killer?

name: A Boy and His Blob: Trouble on Blobolonia
summary: A Boy and His Blob: Trouble on Blobolonia is a 1989 video game developed by Imagineering for the Nintendo Entertainment System (NES). The game was published by Absolute Entertainment in North America and Europe and by Jaleco in Japan. A Boy and His Blob follows an unnamed, male protagonist and his shapeshifting blob friend on their adventure to save the planet of Blobolonia from the clutches of an evil emperor.

name: Absolute Cinema
summary: Build your movie empire! Create blockbusters by combining 44 topics and 22 genres, hire star actors through auditions, develop your studio and technologies. Crazy random events, references to real stars, and tons of humor. Prove you're the best director!

name: Absylon 7
summary:
Absylon 7 is a first-person psychological horror game with shooter elements. The game features 13 different locations with multiple playthrough options.

The player investigates several incidents near the Absylon research complex in Eastern Europe. The player has several types of weapons at his disposal, but it's necessary to use them wisely, as there is a limited amount of firepower at all levels. For this purpose we made several variants of passing each level, traps and unique AI for each type of enemies.

name: Absolver: Deluxe Edition
summary: The Absolver: Deluxe Edition Upgrade includes the official soundtrack from Austin Wintory and The Art of Absolver 52-page digital artbook. These items are part of the Absolver: Deluxe Edition package.

name: Absolute Tennis Manager
summary: The most complete Tennis management game!

name: Abst Clicker Farm
summary: Compete with other players in the leaderboard in terms of both total clicks and clicks per second.

name: Abuse
summary: Abuse resembles a side-scrolling platform game. The game is marked for its unusual control scheme: The keyboard is used to move Nick, while the mouse is used for aiming the weapons. The basic gameplay consists of fighting various enemies (mostly the various forms of mutants, who prefer to attack in huge swarms) and solving some simple puzzles, most involving switches.

name: Abduction
summary: How many Humans can you get to your mothership before getting shot down?

name: A Bibelot: Prototo
summary: A retro arcade game with several difficulty modes, as well as high score and best time stats.

name: Abyssal Blood
summary: Abyssal Blood is an Action Rogue-like/Survivors-like where you can dual-wield many types of different weapons at the same time. Play as Lucy, the daughter of Lucifer, who must eliminate all outlaw souls and demons from hell.

name: A Building Full of Cats
summary: A Building Full of Cats is a hidden object game where you need to pet all the cats in the building. Don't leave any cats behind!

name: Abyss X Zero
summary: Explore an expansive world in this 3D Metroidvania with enormous dungeons and stylish combat. Take control of two different characters, fated to battle each other: Codename A and Codename Z, both legendary heroes with unique abilities that change how you fight and interact with the environment.

name: A Bastard's Tale
summary: A game about parrying, attacking, and overcoming difficult foes

name: A Bloody Night
summary:
A Bloody Night is a fast action game where the goal is to tear apart all the enemies you encounter in your way.
Let yourself be guided by your killing spree and your thirst for revenge.
Become the nightmare of your enemies. No one can stop you...
Make your way with ferocity through your opponents!

name: A Book of Beasts and Buddies
summary: A Book of Beasts and Buddies is an interactive beastiary of curious creatures.

name: A Balanced Brew
summary: A Balanced Brew is a challenging but charming tale of one person's unicycle-mounted quest for a good coffee, across improbably treacherous terrain.

name: Absented Age: Squarebound
summary: "Satsuki" is a ghost girl that lost her memory and substance, and she explores DRIFTWORLD to revive her life. This game is the consecutive mixture of ARPG and tactical RPG in roguelike dungeons with the seamless, rapid and stress-free gameplay.

name: Absolute Momentum
summary: Get ready to sprint, jump, slide, and wall run your way in Absolute Momentum. Race through beautiful environments as you find hidden passages and alternate paths utilizing every parkour technique in your disposal. Can you maintain Absolute Momentum?

name: Abandoned Souls
summary: Abandoned Souls is a horror game, shown through a GoPro lens. You play as a vlogger who specializes in urban exploration.

name: Abnormal 1999: Sector 49
summary: Abnormal1999: Sector 49 is a challenging mystery puzzle game. You play as Sam, searching for your daughter in the abandoned Sector 49. Collect 10 consciousnesses to open the portal and escape.

name: Abarenbo Tengu & Zombie Nation
summary: This revival is a dual set of Abarenbo Tengu, a game that was released in 1990 on the Famicom System and Zombie Nation, which was released in the following year. Save the world and fight to maintain the peace in this exciting side-scrolling shooter, now with new modes and functions.

name: Abo Khashem
summary: Start your adventure in the City of Torrid! Fight enemies in a whole new way, develop your entrepreneurial skills, explore dangerous dungeons, and discover hidden treasures! Experience the captivating journey of Abo Khashem.

name: Abermore
summary: Inherit the role of a mythical thief and pull off the heist of the century in Abermore, a first-person RPG where stealth is your key to fame and fortune. You have 18 days to ransack houses, sell stolen loot, acquire new gear and form alliances to prepare for the ultimate heist.

name: Abelana's Atom Maker
