summary: Visualize atomic orbitals, navigate across energy levels, gain an intuitive understanding of the composition of atoms and their electron configurations by assembling all elements of the periodic table. An educational VR experience designed for use by enthusiasts and academics alike.

name: Abathor
summary: Abathor is a 2D arcade action platformer for up to 4 players. You are the last hope in defense of Atlantis, you’ll face hordes of enemies and countless challenges. Enjoy its pixel art and epic music. A cooperative and competitive game to achieve glory or death.

name: Abalone
summary:
The official adaptation of the famous board game Abalone. Abalone is the adaptation of the famous million selling board game on iPhone and iPad. Discover or rediscover Abalone, play in the classic way or try all the different competition variations boards: Swiss daisy, the Alien, Fujiyama…

The rules are really simples: aligns 3 balls and push your opponent’s marble out of the board. The first that eject 6 balls of his opponents win the game.

name: Abyss
summary: Abyss Online is an immersive MMORPG set in the mystical world of Aeternea. Engage in epic quests, intense combat, and shape your destiny. Customize your character with powerful weapons and armors. Explore diverse landscapes and uncover hidden secrets. Experience a captivating online adventure.

name: Absolutely Goode Championship
summary: A realistic racing game with marbles. Design countless tracks and pilot a marble in fast races against 15 different teams, race your rivals to the championship podium in 10 pre-rendered tracks or just watch to an idle race in randomly created ones.

name: Abfense
summary: Abfense - is a Tower Defense / FPS hybrid. Make sure that your choice is correct, overcome obstacles and solve puzzles to defeat enemies on your doorstep.

name: Abiotic Factor - Supporter's Pack
summary: Reserved for the most dedicated of GATE researchers, the Supporter’s Pack features a Home World, which is a base-building portal location and a home-away-from-home. The Supporter’s Pack also contains the full standard uniform of all GATE Torii researchers.

name: A=B
summary: A=B is a programming puzzle game with only one instruction: A=B, which means replacing A with B.

name: Abyss King
summary: The abyss In the bottomless dark abyss, Xiao Wei lights up the lights, attracting the attention of the surrounding creatures, and the sound of footsteps approaching quickly to support this luminous object , light the path, and work together to find the way out of the abyss..

name: Abtos Covert
summary: You are in a remote military outpost at Mount Abtos and you're tasked to guard it. The only things visible from there are an old shrine and the forest. Many are afraid of this infamous outpost because of the local folklore stories. Actually, too many stories....will you be safe, all alone?

name: Aberrant Nights
summary: Aberrant Nights is a first-person psychological horror game. The protagonist will travel to a suburban gas station in the middle of the night to become a part-time gas station worker.

name: A Blind Legend
summary: A Blind Legend is the first-ever action-adventure game without video – where ears replace eyes! Discover the original, innovative sensory experience of binaural 3D sound.

name: A Boy and His Blob: Retro Collection
summary:
The Blob is back in an exclusive collection with Limited Run Games. The Retro Collection includes the original NES A Boy and His Blob: Trouble on Blobolonia, and The Rescue of Princess Blobette, originally on Game Boy.
Discover Blob's amazing appetite for jellybeans, and the different transformations that occur with each favor. Learn to use these shapes to overcome even the most outrageous obstacles.

name: Abandoned: Chestnut Lodge Asylum
summary: These days the Chestnut Lodge Asylum is abandoned and forgotten, but many years ago a terrible tragedy unfolded behind those rusty gates. Every year, patients disappeared from the asylum without a trace. Neither the nurses nor the police could find any clues. But one day, everything changed. My dreams draw me to the asylum and I yearn to return to my normal life - a life without nightmares, premonitions, and fears.... Explore the Asylum and its surroundings, find out the true story of this place and face your fears in this gripping Hidden Object Puzzle Adventure!

name: Abscission
summary: Abscission is a Lovecraftian, story-driven horror point-and-click investigation game. It involves searching crime scenes for evidence, combining clues and questioning suspects. Puzzles can have multiple solutions as you guide the protagonist - Detective Will Stanhope - through the story.

name: Abra-cooking-dabra
summary: Abra-Cooking-Dabra is a cooking card game. Manage ingredients and make British dishes to keep toves, borogoves, and mome raths fed. Meet timers and fulfill puzzling orders despite the angry wacky Cat being your boss. You are Wonderland's new chef.

name: A Bug's Life
summary:
A Bug's Life is a video game based on the Disney/Pixar film of the same name. It was released for various systems in 1998 and in 1999. The game's storyline is similar to that of the movie, with a few changes. After completing levels the player can unlock real clips from the movie. Its Game.com, Sega Saturn, and Dreamcast versions were cancelled.

Though the film was Roddy McDowall's final theatrical performance, the game was his final work before his death.

name: Aborigenus
summary: Aborigenus is a small adventure platformer with RPG-elements in a primal world. Hunt the aggressive fauna, learn new abilities and fight with the whole enemy army. Choose who you are - a shaman, a warrior or a hunter. Can you save the flying islands from the evil?

name: Abyss: The Wraiths of Eden
summary: Find your missing fiancé in the deepest parts of the ocean in a forgotten underwater city that hides many spine-chilling secrets and an ancient evil that is hiding in the deepest chambers of the once idyllic city of Eden.

name: Abracademy
summary: Get your sorcery diploma!

name: Abort, Retry, Fail
summary: Abort, Retry, Fail is a top-down roguelike action adventure in which you play as a lazy programmer that has to generate his own weapon and shoot his way through hordes of enemies. Are you brave enough to help him escape from computer hell of Windows 98?

name: Abby Monkey Basic Skills Pre K
summary:
***** Winner of prestigious Recommended Seal awarded by Parents’ Choice Award Program
***** Developed by an award-winning education studios, 22learn, the creator of the best-selling apps for kids, in cooperation with educational specialists to best prepare your children for success in preschool and kindergarten curriculum. 

Numbers, Patterns, Puzzles, Letters, Counting, Sizes, Shadows, Matching, Colors, Shapes, Differences and more -- you are on the right address! 

================================ 
BEST WAY TO PREPARE your kids for SUCCES in PRESCHOOL and KINDERGARTEN CURRICULUM! 14(!) great different exciting proven educational activities to develop your child's skills. 
================================ 

Its simple child-friendly interface offers children an engaging way to master essential preschool skills in the total of 14 (!) DIFFERENT EXCITING EDUCATIONAL ACTIVITIES (twelve educational activities + two creative activities). We sincerely hope your children will enjoy them all! 

PRESS REVIEW: 

* “Like most parents, I know that multitasking is a must, not just an option. That’s why I love kids’ apps that touch on tons of educational topics and do it in style. The new Abby – Basic Skills Preschool app is just such an app . . . Plainly, the tykes in my crew loved this app. Abby – Basic Skills Preschool app is a homerun” - bestappsforkids.com 

* “Completely kid oriented; no complicating menus to navigate, bright colors, fun characters, and prizes make this app extremely easy to use and engaging for young children. The variety helps to keep my three-year-old engrossed” - theiphonemom.com 

The ENTHUSIASTIC MONKEY CHARACTER is going to guide children through the whole game. As a reward after each round, children receive the opportunity to become creative artists and CHANGE THE DESIGN OF THE TRAIN, or obtain STICKERS TO SHOW OFF ON THEIR BOARD! 

================================ 
12 Educational games included 
================================ 

1) NUMBER RECOGNITION – New!!!

Number Matching is a fun way to encourage both counting skills and number recognition. It is a great kindergarten or preschool game that is educational without taxing the brain too much. 

2) COUNTING 
Count the toys! Hearing the counting pronounced helps children to better remember the order of the numerals as well as get used to the counting procedure. Way to learn how to count! 

3) LETTERS 
Tap on the word that starts with the letter that was pronounced! Great for teaching children to realize the connection of letters to words, understand the position of the first letter, and practise matching the names of letters to their symbolic notation! 


4) PATTERNS 
Gives children practice in the area of common patterns recognition. 

5) SHAPES 
Find the right shape! Teaches children recognition of names of common shapes (such as a square, rectangle, triangle and more). 


6) PUZZLES 
Fix the broken toy! Enables your children to train fine motor skills and improve their logical thinking. 


7) SIZES 
Trains understanding of the comparative nature of concepts of big, small and the same! 


8) MATCHING 
Match the toys! Serves to train children's memory and understanding of the concept of the sameness. 

9) COLORS 
Find the toy in a given color! Great both for children only beginning to learn and those who need additional practice. 

10) SHADOWS 
Drag the object to its silhouette! 

11) SAME AND DIFFERENT 
Tests the ability of comparing pictures and finding differences. Select the different toy among several others or find the same toy as the displayed one. 

12) THINGS THAT GO TOGETHER 
This part is designed to help kids learn and practice their ability to recognize things that go together and things that do not. It also increases the power of logical thinking and the problem solving skills.

name: Absolute Sudoku
summary: A sudoku game from Magnussoft.

name: Absolute X
summary: A top-down 2D arcade shooter with power-ups.

name: Abysm: Dawn of Innocence
summary:
Abysm: Dawn of Innocence is an action adventure GZDoom TC for Doom2 inspired by medieval themed games such as Diablo, Dark Souls, and Hexen.
the mod features A Hub level progression where you complete quests while slaughtering demons along the way with various Medieval weapons and Spells.

name: Abyssal Survivors
summary: Fight thousands of monsters in the abyss and survive your delve! Abyssal Survivors is an anime casual game with bullet hell and rogue-lite elements. Build your party of unique delvers with overpowered combination!

name: Above the Fold
summary: In this newspaper sim, you're the new Editor-in-Chief! Can you turn a small local newspaper into a well-respected media power house? Grow your staff of reporters, get subscribers, win awards and more!

name: Abyssopelagia
summary: A short game about an octopus named Ophelia exploring the depths of the ocean in search of little fish to eat.

name: Aboleo: Shadow of the Crown
summary: Immerse yourself in 'Shadow of the Crown,' an RPG where the line between heroism and darkness blurs. Step into the enigmatic role of a charismatic figure, torn between conquering or saving a kingdom. Shape its destiny through trust or chaos. Your choices wield the power to define its fate.

name: A Birthday Present
summary: You have been preparing this gift for a long time, and now you will embark on a journey to deliver it to your friends. On this long journey, you will encounter many interesting things.

name: A Business Tycoon
summary: A tycoon game for the iPhone

name: Aboriginal
summary: Embark on an epic adventure in "Aboriginal," tapping into inherited powers and unraveling ancestral mysteries. Traverse India and the mystic Tiroti Islands, inspired by the real-life isolated Sentinel Island in the Indian Ocean, on a journey of self-discovery and redemption.

name: Absolute Blue
summary: Sidescrolling Shoot’em’up that will transport you back into the 90s (and space).

name: Abyss and Dark: The King's Secret Pledge
About a Mouse
summary: Mutation, it is the key to our evolution, it has enabled us to evolve from a single celled organism, into the dominate species on the planet. But every few hundred millennia, evolution leaps forward.

name: Abandoned Archive
summary: Abandoned Archive is a fantasy, spell-casting, rogue-like, featuring a wide variety of relics, a unique spell-upgrading system, with compelling and engaging bosses. Each floor is filled with items and mysteries for the player to uncover; what will you discover in the Abandoned Archive?

name: Abo Hadeed
summary:
The first full-fledged 3D PC and network game ever to be inspired by the Egyptian environment, based on the famous Egyptian movie Booha.

The game is a third person shooter action game, where the protagonist Abo Hadeed aka Boo7a struggles against various criminal groups in various Egyptian scenes. Through those adventures, Abo Hadeed fights different enemies, solves difficult puzzles and discovers a lot of staggering revelations.

name: Absolution's Apple
summary: A thousand years beyond the fall of Earth, a team of adventurers seeks ancient treasure and the cure to a deadly disease, in this 600 page tale of love, crime, hope and despair, in a post-apocalyptic world like no other...

name: Aberration Analyst
summary: Aberration Analyst is a game in which the player must process incomplete and unreliable data in order to identify the locations of monsters. The player is an analyst whose decisions will determine the fate of a team of monster hunters and specialists ... and the world.

name: A Bit of Light
summary:
Find the balance between your obligations and passions while taking care of yourself.

Follow the life of our little protagonist as the weekend unfolds.

Spend your time wisely and make every activity count. As you make choices, you'll see how your head fills with positive or negative thoughts, so make sure you also try to rest a bit so your head doesn't clutter. Try to find the four different endings!

name: A Busty Student Council President and H Monsters
Abyssal Lab
summary: Build a laboratory in the abyssal depths.

name: Above: The Fallen
summary: Above: The Fallen is a 2D side-scrolling, puzzle - platformer game that is centered around travelling upwards instead of to the left or right. The goal is to climb the trees of an ancient and mystical forest in order to break through the canopy. You must manipulate two main characters at the same time throughout the game, solve puzzles, and avoid the hazards of this dark forest.

name: AbraTabia Kingdom
summary: AbraTabia is a magical adventure game where you can build and defend your own kingdom . Grow your citizen population while managing food, gold and resources. Upgrade buildings and research technologies to enhance your soldiers and player character. PVP battles with armies, siege weapons and more.

name: Abaddon
summary: Abaddon is a first-person psychological horror game steeped in Lovecraftian elements. Descend into a haunting story as you take on the role of Jimmy, searching for his missing brother Georgie while confronting his past in a nightmarish world.

name: Abble Dabble HD
summary: Abble Dabble is the revolution of crossword games with classic word play with a new twist. Expand your game. It's like yoga for your mind.

name: Abandoned Realms
summary: The Abandoned Realms MUD is a fully-featured multiplayer experience with roleplaying and playerkilling. As you play the game, you will make both great friends, and vicious enemies - all real people who are playing alongside you!

name: A Balloon Game
summary: Keep the balloons in the air! Last as long as you can in this relaxing little game.

name: Absolute Skat
summary: A game based on the popular German card game Skat.

name: Aberoth
summary: Aberoth is a fantasy massively multiplayer online role playing game with charming retro graphics and tons of freedom.

name: Abstract Golfing
summary: Abstract Golfing - this is a simple game where you need to throw the ball higher and higher on the mountain, you can not die, there is no reset button, so from this game you get only peace and pleasure.

name: Absolute Unit
summary: Play as a small dog and his quest to get all the treats.

name: A Bird Called Mike
summary:
Guide Mike and his friends home in this new fun and addictive game.
Test your skills as you fly and flip your way through different worlds and challenges. Gain points, unlock new levels and avoid the baddies. Simple addictive gameplay that will keep you entertained for hours!
The new hit game!

name: Absent II
summary: An adventure game from FNGames.

name: Abstractanoid
summary: A retro-style arkanoid about fighting aliens to save the mankind.

name: Abnormal Stairs
summary: "Abnormal Stairs" is a game where you go down the stairs while looking for abnormalities.

name: A Break in the Road
summary: The perfect game for DJs, dance floor fanatics, or anybody who loves fresh beats. You play an aspiring DJ who gets the break of a lifetime - it's up to you to write a hot, new dance track for a huge party. Problem is, the party is tonight! So, hit the streets of London with your sampler and grab some 'sounds of the street' to mix into a new song.

name: Abomination
summary: Abomination is a squad-based real time action game for the PC developed in 1999 by Hothouse creations

name: Abyss Odyssey: Extended Dream Edition
summary: It's a never-ending dream….

name: Abyss and Dungeon
summary: "Abyss and Dungeon" is a fantasy adventure fighting game.

name: Abrix 2: Diamond Version
summary: Abrix 2 is an addictive puzzle game for everyone. Try over 170 different levels of puzzles and secrets and help Abrix, a tiny toy robot, to find a way out. Abrix 2 is a continuation of a hit game Abrix the robot. Now with new graphics and full of new stuff it's better than ever.

name: Abi: A Robot's Tale
summary:
With the pace of technological development, our lives increasingly rely on machines. But is that a good thing?

Technology can lead us astray, but it can also be our redemption…
One day in the distant future, the obsolete household robot Abi finds the hibernating industrial robot DD, and together they escape the warehouse in which they have been locked away. Once they get out, they discover that humans have mysteriously disappeared from the earth. Where did the humans go and what can explain their disappearance? It’s up to you, Abi, and DD to find out.
In this one-of-a-kind and mysterious world, you will experience:
-Unique gameplay. Switch between the two main characters and unlock the secrets of this intriguing world by solving puzzles.
-Stunning artwork throughout, depicting an abandoned yet surprisingly beautiful world.
-Musical Score by well-known composer creates an immersive experience.
-A moving and thought-provoking story
-An intriguing post-apocalyptic journey

name: A Bark in the Dark
summary: Bring on your point and clicking skills as it's time for a brand new homemade BONTE game: A bark in the dark!

name: Absolute Instant
summary: Spaceship scroll-shooter with teleport mechanics for iOS.

name: Absolutely Killed
summary: A full episode of short, concept-oriented maps for Ultimate Doom. Beware: Not your traditional Doom WAD.

name: Absolute Schafkopf
summary:
This is the German version of Absolute Schafkopf!

Schafkopf is a popular German card game and is played by young and old with great enthusiasm.

Whether beginner or professional player, in Absolute Schfkopf you can find what you need for an exciting Schafkopf challenge.

Various difficulty levels and many kinds of settings for the gameplay give you the opportunity to make the cardgame customised. Play with different card decks, which also include a Bavarian deck. Now start a relaxing Schafkopf match.

name: Absolute Solitaire & Patience
summary: Absolute Solitaire & Patience is a comprehensive collection of more than 200 of the most popular variants of Solitaire, for instance Bakers Dozen, Canfield, Carlton, Four Seasons, Freecell, Klondike and Yukon.

name: Above Below
summary: Above Below is a tree-growing simulator in which you can create your own unique tree. Manage resources to grow bigger and stronger. Strengthen yourself against the elements and threats that are determined to destroy you. Learn what makes a good tree great. From seed to tree the journey is up to you!

name: Abort
summary: Dark shadows linger on the past. The brutal truth is hidden beneath the mask of a seemingly happy family. Dear brother, watch your steps and hold onto my hands. Don't fall into the darkness alone. Be our eyes, be our escape.

name: Absorbed
summary: It all started with one scientist experimenting in his lab. He called on you to try it. You absorbed some things and then suddenly an explosion occurred. A black whole appeared and brought you somewhere unknown. Continue in this manner and you might get back to where you came from. You just have to try it.

name: Abstract World
summary: Abstract top-down game with shooter elements.

name: Abyss of Death
summary: Abyss of Death is an action game set in Vietnam War. As a lost soldier destroy buildings, smash bunches of enemies and get out of this hell on your own or with a friend.

name: Absolute Talent
summary: A survival crafting RPG where you are stranded on an island and must withstand attacks from the native inhabitants.

name: ABI-DOS
summary: ABI-DOS is an open-ended assembly puzzle game. You are asked to design circuits using a fictional programming language to solve problems that require a great deal of creativity and logic.

name: Abashera
summary: Abashera is a first person maze/platform game. Your mission is to find, and sometimes activate, the exit by solving different tasks. The maps are filled with very single minded creatures and much of the point of the game is to learn these creatures behaviors. Different dogs eat each other, frogs jump when you move in front of them, you can kill green dogs by falling on them, etc.

name: Abhorrent Light
summary: A dark medieval first person hack and slash with procedural elements. Navigate the darkness and shed light on what lies below.

name: Abandoned Cabins in the Woods
summary: Abandoned Cabins in the Woods is a 2D Top-Down Survival Horror game based on the story of a paranormal investigator and streamer called Thomas who decided to investigate the haunted Idaho woods for the paranormal evidence upon the request of his fans.

name: Abashment
summary: Abashment is a Yume Nikki fangame made for Dream Diary Jam 4. You play as Jonathan and explore his dreams.

name: A Bloody Party
summary: "Vampires don't exist... right?" When your best friend becomes obsessed with vampires and bravely (foolishly) decides to crash a party to prove his crazy theory, you end up volunteering to go in his place to stop him. After all, a night of free food and dancing? Why not? It's not like vampires actually exist, right?

name: Abandon
summary: Abandon is a Boom-compatible wad composed of large, difficult slaughter maps.

name: Abduct and Destroy!
summary: A procedurally generated twin stick shooter, where the main mechanic is based around abducting enemies.

name: ABM
summary: Missile Command clone for the Apple II.

name: Abstract Hell
summary: Abstract Hell is a realm of many hostile creatures made of simple lines, curves, and light, and they're bent on destroying you while you navigate the treacherous mazes collecting tokens to advance to the next level. Become overwhelmed in a variety of ways—sheer numbers, shifting environments, and various pranks.

name: A Bonte Escape
summary: You find yourself dropped in a strange room, but are you smart enough to get out?

name: Abandoned Moons
summary: Embark with your friends to explore abandoned moons in search of resources and valuable loot in a cooperative first-person horror experience. Level up and assemble a complete arsenal of tools, gadgets, and helper robots to accomplish the mission.

name: Abbot's Book
summary:
A trailer for the 8-episode narrative VR The Abbot's Book.

1680, Vicenza, Italy. Explore the ruins of an ancient religion that riddle the catacombs beneath a noble estate, where the shadow of a forgotten god has awakened to haunt the dreams of men. A dark tale in the classic, gothic tradition, The Abbot’s Book traces the lives of four generations of a family cursed by the corrupting influence of a mysterious book.

When complete, The Abbot's Book will be 8 episodes of VR narrative content.

name: Absent Mind
summary: In Absent Mind, you are put in the place where you were born as you cross the bridge into the afterlife. The hospital was used as the bridge and it contains important items of your past.The hospital will decide your fate. Will you move on to the next life, or become a patient forever?

name: Abomin-Agency!
summary: Abomin-Agency! is a party game for 3 to 8 players. Players compete to design the 'best monster for the job' for the clients of Dr. Frankenstein's Super Fantastical Monster Factory. Design & pitch your creation to your fellow players to win the big pay day!

name: Ablockalypse
summary: A classic reignited... Can you place all the pieces together before the time runs out? Put your spatial visualization ability to the test with this quick paced action puzzle game which will continually keep you coming back for more.

name: ABC Preschool car truck and engine dot puzzles
A Byte War
summary: A Byte War is a real time strategy game where you lead a race of block-based machines against a machine threat from another dimension. Construct buildings from blocks arranged in various patterns and leverage your machines to convert the world around you.

name: Abyss of Light
summary: In a near-future interstellar mission, our vessel is shattered by asteroids, leaving you as the sole survivor. You land on a mysterious celestial body, facing unknown challenges and hidden secrets. Will you persevere?

name: Absolute RC Plane Simulator
summary: A must have for anyone flying radio controlled models. Probably the most realistic behavior on mobile phones and tablets. You will find many lifelike models that fly just the same as real RC models you own or have seen, in real RC flying fields.

name: Abandoned Croxon Mansion
summary: Abandoned Croxon Mansion is a 2D Top-Down Survival Horror game based on the story of the Haunted Mansion, built during the 1960s.

name: A Blinding Void
summary: Snow in all directions. Made for the Bitsy Community Secret Santa 2020.

name: Abducted Toad: 10th Anniversary Edition!
Absolute Dishonor
summary: Absolute Dishonor is a brand-new 8-level WAD created between Michael Jan "valkiriforce" Krizik and Jon "40oz" Vail - four maps from each map author. The levels are inspired from old-school Doom WADs from the 90's such as Memento Mori and The Plutonia Experiment.

name: A Boy And His Barrel
summary:
You've befriended (and apparently married) a barrel full of blueberry sauce named Violet, but the demons don't understand your love and will attack the both of you without hesitation.

Both of you must make it out alive - if either of you dies, you must restart. Defend her with the limited provisions you get, and escort her to the exit gate!

name: A Bad Day for a Hangover
summary: You awaken with the worst of hangovers in a nuclear bunker with supplies running low, the only chance of survival is to scavenge for tinned goods in the robot infested nuclear wasteland above before the town is nuked again

name: ABCs with Dally Dino: Preschool Kids Learn the Alphabet with A Fun Dinosaur Friend
Above the Law
summary: Take to the skies in your VTOL Police vehicle. Use your radar to track speeders and chase them down, scan for contraband and stop heavily armed street gangs from taking over in this Sci-fi open world action game

name: Ab Aeterno
summary: Ab Aeterno is a story-driven hardcore survival experience with both well known and brand new survival mechanics designed and polished for VR from the ground up.

name: Absurd Trolley Problems
summary: A game that gives you increasingly absurd trolley problems. Help humanity solve philosophy by solving all the trolley problems.

name: Absolute Baseball
summary: Become the manager of a baseball team and lead it to the championship.

name: A Boy's Journey
summary: Influence obstacles and gain power-ups in this beautiful skill-based platformer. Aim for the best highscore and if you don't like that one level, just generate a new one! Freeze and destroy obstacles or create a whole new path. Or give yourself a speed boost and invulnerability.

name: ABC Sports Presents: The Palm Spring Open
summary: A golfing game for the CD-i that uses photographic backdrops and actors.

name: Abyssal
summary: Dive into "Abyssal," a deep-sea horror game where you pilot a cutting-edge diving suit. Brave the abyss, confront fears, gather resources, and unravel hidden secrets in a haunting, immersive world.

name: Abyss Infection
summary: This game is based on RMVX ace and ABS script development of ARPG class soft science fiction game. You can use the character's own skills and weapons to complete the mission and kill the enemy. By installing different mod equipment, you can cause different effects of element damage to the enemy, and even change the attack mode

name: Abode 2
summary: Explore and investigate every corner and detail of this highly interactive apartment to unveil all its secrets and restore power to the city. A game inspired by the "escape the room" genre.

name: Abnimality
summary: Abnimality is a platformer game with racing elements, explosions and a physical world, where the player uses explosions to control his character, who must jump to the end of the level before the others.

name: Abstract Code
summary: Embark on a unique gaming experience that delves into thought-provoking themes... this SHMUP/Visual Novel hybrid offers a compelling narrative interspersed with addictive arcade gameplay.

name: Abysmal Gateway
summary: Abysmal Gateway is an Open World Dark Fantasy action-RPG with fast-paced combat. Venture into the depths and the forsaken realms of the abyss. Will you emerge victorious, or be consumed by the darkness? This journey is not for the faint of heart!

name: Abyss of Cain
summary: It's a side-scrolling strategy game with deck-building and roguelike elements. Players will play the role of a pit explorer driving a mecha, collect various equipment, defeat underground monsters, and uncover the secrets of the "Abyss of Cain" step by step.

name: Abstractism
summary:
Abstractism - is an absolutely trivial platformer, but with the one really special feature - there is no the "Game Over"! But instead, there is an ASMR soundtrack, a stylish minimalistic design and a relaxing atmosphere inside!

Abstractism was delisted on Steam on July 30th, 2018 after players like YouTuber SidAlpha began investigating the game’s high CPU and GPU usage. Investigators discovered the game was running cryptocurrency mining software and the developers encouraged players to leave the game running in the background to accrue in-game items.

At the same time, the developers were engaging in the practice of releasing Steam Marketplace items that very closely mimicked sought after items from other popular titles. By offering these items to unsuspecting players on Steam, they would sell the item and then alter the appearance and description.

In response, Valve pulled the game from the Steam store on July 30th and banned the developer from the service. At the time they also instituted a system of confirmation messages that players needed to click in order to confirm item trade offers for games that Steam has identified they have never played.

name: Abenteuer Europa
summary: Abenteuer Europa is a promotional game by the German party SPD to reach new voters for the election of the European Parliament in 1994. In this game you are playing as journalist Fred Beck who travels through countries of the European Union while revealing a conspiracy of organized crime.

name: A Busty JK Teaches How to Do Petit Compensated Dating
summary: A visual novel from School Love.

name: Absence Request
summary:
A game where the objective is to solve the mystery of you and why you had that dream at the beginning of the game.
It has crafting, shooter and escaping capabilities and is mainly focused on pranking and humour.
The plot description is available below.

name: ABC World
summary: An educational spelling game.

name: Abyss
summary: The Abyss is a unique adventure game that blends strategic decision-making with varied puzzle challenges. Players control an adventurer attempting to cross a treacherous network of bridges spanning a deadly abyss. The game begins with a bird's-eye view of the bridge system, requiring quick route planning as lingering too long results in falling. Upon reaching each bridge's end, players face diverse challenges from monsters, ranging from solving math problems to navigating mazes. These mini-games add depth and variety to the core bridge-crossing mechanic. The ultimate goal is to reach the Mountain of the Golden Lion, marked by a flashing 'F'. This mix of time-pressured navigation and varied puzzles creates a compelling and multifaceted gaming experience that tests both reflexes and problem-solving skills.

name: Abstraction
summary: Abstraction is an old school survival horror game. Vi is a woman who wakes up in a bed without recollection of her last hours. Fighting against her internal struggles and the dangers that hide behind every corner, Vi must survive her personal hell in a world that often does not seem to make sense.

name: ABC Search with Me: Animal Pack
summary: ABC Search with Me: Animal Pack is a collection of additional game levels featuring dozens of animals that extend the fun time in the game ABC Search with Me!

name: Abskur
summary: A sound based, arcade like sneaking game

name: ABC Search with Me: Food Pack
summary: "Food Pack" is a collection of additional game levels with dozens of foods that extend the fun time in the game ABC Search with Me!

name: Abh
summary: This is a psychological thriller game set in the 1990's, you wake up in a strange house and must search the house for a way out, if that is how your story will end. There will be some jumpscares.

name: About Time
summary: Welcome to the Clockmaker’s Workshop, where you will learn the art and science of fixing clocks. You are an apprentice clockmaker, and your job is to adjust the clocks according to the customer’s requests.

name: Abha
summary:
Abha is an old-school point-and-click adventure game.
Experience a fantasy world and go on an initiation quest full of twists and turns.
Find items, solve puzzles, and experience environments brimming with poetry.

Abha is a young woman living in a village that was deserted after an attack by a warrior people.
The thick jungle canopy obscures the sky. Abha decides to leave her homeland, her soul drawn to follow a new path. She'll embark on a long journey…

name: A Block Party!
summary:
A Block Party a free puzzle game with simple rules.
The engaging puzzle game with a simple but distinctive gameplay. With it's easy to learn and fun to master gameplay 10x10 columns is the perfect mobile puzzle game.

Drag and drop the colour blocks into the 10x10 board, then clear the blocks by making a line of full bricks horizontally or vertically. This puzzle game ends when you don't have enough space to put a given block into the board. No time limit, no colour match! Fill all the grids with the matching blocks and enjoy this puzzle game! Have fun!!

name: Absolute Territory: The Space Combat Simulator
Abducting Mjolnir
summary: Help Grooby fix his ship using Thor's hammer

name: Absolver: Downfall
summary: Battle deep in the mines of Adal as a solo warrior or in online cooperative play, collecting Gleam from Prospects infected by Arcell, an Etheran bent on breaking the Fold’s containment.. The more Gleam you capture, the more powerful you become in your struggle to defeat the Corrupted, and even Arcell himself. Each run through the Mines and Temples is a unique path through a variety of challenges and situations, facing upgraded enemies, and three epic boss fights.

name: Abraxas
summary:
Link #19 in Haunted PS1's C.H.A.I.N. is purported to mirror an unknown apocalypse-esque event and its cover art supposedly has an intoxicating effect on some who witness it.

Now there is nothing more to do. I must do what I promised my father.

name: A Butterfly in the District of Dreams
summary: An otherworldly town and the people who occupy it... It feels as if time doesn't pass here. This is the story of Olive Village, and the people who make it special.

name: Absolute Zero
summary: In the 24th century, on the frozen Jovian moon of Europa, earth has established a colony to extract water from the moon. One of the mining facilities accidentally discovers on their excavations members of a long-buried alien race. The creatures, now awake, slaughter all the miners and destroy the moon's capital city. It's up to you now to defend what's left of the colony and eliminate the aliens, or at least hold them off until help arrives.

name: Abrakajumpa
summary: Jump your way to the top!

name: Abandoned Snowy Castle
summary: You are traveling to England with your little sister during the summer holiday. But what comes is...

name: Abyss of Neptune
summary: Abyss of Neptune is a survival horror game set in the deep seas of the Bermuda Triangle. You are sent to investigate a mysterious underwater signal, but there is more to it than meets the eye. Do you have what it takes to survive the abyss?

name: Abrakadaboom
summary: Face your friends as powerful wizards fighting in thematic arenas in this multiplayer party game that combines fun and intensity along with a gameplay that is both easy to learn and rich of subtleties. Get ready for lots of laughs and mayhem!

name: A Bug's Life
summary: An electronic gaming device based on A Bug's Life.

name: Abscond
summary: Avoiding all obstacles and collect points before they are destroyed. Watch out for projectiles and enemies stalking you! Will you the #1 highscore on leaderboard against your friends?

name: Abyss Vein
summary: This is an open world sandbox game. Currently, it's the first big release. The content of the game includes: domestication, genes, relics, excavation, building, construction and theft

name: AbyysRium
summary: AbyssRium

name: Abandoning Spies
summary: "Abandoning Spies" is an intense Metroidvania adventure. As Agent Pierce, navigate a complex world, master movement and gunplay, and unravel a deceptive underworld crime web. Inspired by characters Lazzy, Jasper, and Claire, will you uncover the truth?

name: Abondoned Village
summary: A first person horror game about an enthusiastic historian who found an old map of a hidden village... ignorant of the story of that village he decided to explore it, not knowing that there is a monster sealed in it, eventually releasing the monster that is trying to kill him.

name: Absolute Alchemical Potion
summary: Behold: the great scientist-alchemist Celsia. Help the protagonist recover her power and brew the potion that’ll change the world, or find true and eternal love.

name: A Blocky Kind of Love
summary: A fresh new take on a love adventure lets you pursue romance on a wild ride over land sea and air. Your object of affection needs to be won over. Do you have what it takes to win her/his heart?

name: Absolute Doppelkopf for Windows 11
summary: This new version of "Absolute Doppelkopf for Windows 11" contains an extended set of rules with an extensive compilation of different variants and settings.

name: Abandon 2
summary:
Abandon 2 is a Breakout game with an unique approach.

Like any other Breakout game, your job is to remove all bricks in the level with a ball you control via your paddle, while avoiding the loss of the ball when it goes outside the screen. Once all bricks are destroyed in a level, you proceed to the next one. When all your lives are gone, you have lost.

The unique thing about this Breakout is that you don't just control one single paddle (which is usually on the lower side of the screen), but you control actually four paddles simultaneously (on each side of the screen is one paddle).

The paddle control is so made, that you can easily move all four paddle just with your mouse. But the result is, that only two paddles are normal (left to right; up to down). The other two are reverse (moving the mouse left to right will move the paddle right to left).

The game itself offers two game modes, Classic and Extreme. Classic is the actual Breakout game, where you play through 12 levels. Extreme is basically Classic minus Breakout. All you need to do is to reflect the ball as long as possible (the often the ball hits the paddles, the more you score).

name: A Barren Wasteland
summary: 'A Barren Wasteland' is interactive fiction, with a directional-based narrative, multiple paths and endings. It is simple to play, but challenging to complete. Story additions will come through as updates periodically.

name: Abandoned Nursery
summary:
The morbid silence of a strange town is broken when some noises are heard from inside of the abandoned nursery's building...
Step in your role as a detective in this interactive fiction and start finding clues.

name: About Love and Hate 2
summary: Never press the red button. Everybody knows that. By some mishap, HATE's kid trips the red button and disappears immediately. And thus LOVE and HATE set off again, this time to find the careless child. Stay calm, think, and train your grey cells. With the power of LOVE and the energy of HATE, you steer the two main characters through airy heights, dark castles and endless expanses. Look forward to a reunion with LOVE, HATE, and of course the OTHER ONES.

name: Ableford
summary: A 2d exploration game. You play as Casey and do some odd jobs for folks around town so you can build your machine.

name: Abzorb
summary:
Abzorb is a tilt game about consuming orbs by inching as close as you can to them without touching. By tilting your mobile device, collect blue orbs as fast as you can while evading the time-stealing reds. 
 
 
Master 80 challenging levels and unlock new color schemes with the stars you earn along the way. There's also a Daily Challenge, offering up a unique combo of 5 levels for you to conquer, everyday!

name: A Better Tomorrow
summary: Join the green revolution! Relax and learn about clean energy in this cozy, minimalist 2D city-building strategy game. Build windmills, solar panels, and more to provide energy to villages and cities while protecting the environment. Let's work together to make 'A Better Tomorrow'!

name: Abu Simbel Profanation
summary:
The protagonist, Johny Jones, have been mutated by the curse of Abu Simbel, becoming a strange creature that only conserves his enormous nose of his old appearance.

In order to get rid of the curse he is forced to travel to Egypt to the pyramid where is the tomb of Abu Simbel, and where it must arrive after discovered the keys that will lead him to this place. If he obtains it, he will recover his normal appearance.

As logical, the pyramid is filled of traps and strange creatures who will suppose a serious obstacle for our pretensions, and the only weapon is our skill to be jump from a side to another one without falling in the claws of our enemies, or the traps that are in all places. He can do long or short jumps, according to the situation in which one is.

name: Abyss of Fire
summary: A peaceful kingdom is frozen by the curse of the ice witch Kione. The mysterious girl "Laila" who appeared from somewhere and the mysterious spirit "Flara" who appeared from somewhere head to the kingdom to solve the curse of the kingdom together!

name: Abyss Manager
summary: Take over a small dungeon that no adventure is interested in as a new manager. You'll start with almost nothing and recruit minions, accumulate money, construct facilities, develop technology, explore the realm, have the dungeon's name up, conquer other dungeons and win the championship of the Dungeon League.

name: A Broken City
summary: There is no one here anymore, yet the trains continue to run.

name: Absconding Zatwor
summary: Absconding Zatwor is a stealth 2D game where an innocent man, Randy Crow, is put in prison for a crime he did not commit. Your mission is to escape from Zatwor prison and prove his innocence.

name: Abyss Seeker
summary: Recipient of the RPG Maker FES Official Event Grand Prize. This RPG involves character growth and quest progression as you seek treasures hidden in the 'Grand Labyrinth,' aiming to reach the deepest part of the dungeon.

name: A Butterfly
summary:
A butterfly wants to cross all gates till the end of the world!
It is a beautiful, lonely, firm butterfly, die for trying! But it never gives up!
This is a one tap arcade game. Reflex is the key and time is more important.
Lots of beautiful butterflies can be unlocked.
Anime music and Movie graphics.

name: Abyss
summary: Abyss is a story-oriented horror game. Players will explore abandoned tourist facilities with abnormal phenomena in the first person, looking for various clues, and unraveling the buried past.

name: Abyss
summary: Abyss is an action-packed free-to-play fantasy adventure roleplaying game (ARPG) enriched with roguelike elements. Embark on a journey into an endless dungeon, seeking potent equipment while confronting formidable creatures fueled by the captivating essence of biopunk enchantments. Are you prepared to endure an expedition into the heart of the Abyss?

name: About Gretel
summary: As the Gretel, build, explore and survive in the dangerous forest. Fight to survive against mysterious Druids of the forest. If you can survive, maybe you can find out what happened to your twin brother and who kidnapped him.

name: AbalaBurn
summary: Eight fighters are searching find eight crystal for a legendary being named Lemuria to grant them a single wish, any which they desire. They will have to defeat the others as well to reach their goal and discover the legend of Lemuria!

name: Abigor
summary: Abigor is a third-person action RPG where you play as Alric, a demon hunter at Alastor Academy who must overcome incredible odds to protect his school from demonkind. Combat features traditional melee combat with dodging, but also a magic stance system which changes the players attacks.

name: Abandoned: A Journey Home
summary:
Abandoned, Alone, Scared and Lost!
This little critter needs your help to get Home!

name: Abyss Unchained
summary: Upcoming indie 3D Metroidvania/Platformer game where you wield a heavy weight to traverse a labyrinthine mansion.

name: A Bear Family Adventure
summary: A Bear Family Adventure: featuring Playtime in the Park is a CD-ROM-based children's edutainment title that had been demoed on the Pippin Atmark console.

name: Abandoned
summary: Abandoned is a cinematic, first-person horror survival shooter set in a highly detailed open world environment and favours a realistic approach to survival

name: Abandoned Dark
summary: The game is a 2D platformer with puzzle elements where you play as a chick trying to go through dark depth. You need to go through different levels along the way, destroying enemies in the location and avoiding traps.

name: Abysus Arena
summary: Abysus Arena is a Cartoon Network online game. It uses the Unity Web Player.

name: Absent in the Rain
summary:
Mysterious senpai.
A murder case that is crowded with the world.
And a huge fish shadow swimming at my feet...
If all of them were connected together and surrounded me like a ring.
What should I do?

name: Abyssal Frontier
summary: You just wanted to finish your cargo run. The universe had other plans, Abyssal Frontier is a choice-driven cosmic horror visual novel with light RPG elements, time loop mechanics, and dating sim suggestions.

name: Abloom
summary: Experience a vibrant flight and slide through a dead forest, solve mysteries, and bring life back to a world consumed by a black hole in this atmospheric puzzle game.

name: Ablight
summary: Ablight is a classic real-time strategy game set in an alternate universe where dieselpunk, cyberpunk and medieval aesthetics meet. Join the rebellion against the zealotic Inquisition, who have been mankinds scourge for hundreds of years and fight a war for survival. Freedom is within touch!

name: Absolute Schafkopf for Windows 11
summary: Schafkopf is a popular German card game and is played by young and old with great enthusiasm. "Absolute Schafkopf for Windows 11" is suitable for beginners and advanced players alike.

name: ABC Match with Me: Extended Edition
Absolute Pinball
summary: Absolute Pinball is a pinball game which features four tables with different themes: Desert Run, Aquatic Adventure, The Dream Factory and Balls 'n Bats. All tables feature three flippers and several mini games on the scoreboard, e.g. swimming away from sharks.

name: Abandoned Knight
summary: The adventures of the young knight begin in an abandoned building where no one expected to find mysterious occurences or the presence of dark powers.

name: Absolutely Unstoppable MineRun
summary: A challenging auto-runner for 1 to 5 players.

name: Abandonware
summary: A lo-fi collection of horror mini games that begins to warp and shift as you uncover more. Play and watch the lines blur between fiction and reality in this one-of-a-kind experience.

name: A Bonnie Odyssey
summary: An open world sci-fi adventure set in the Scottish wilds. A tale of a father and daughter separated by time. A Bonnie Odyssey is a retrofuturist puzzle mystery where you’ll explore an enigmatic abandoned island, unravel the secrets of your own past, and make odd little friends along the way.

name: A Bird Hunt: Retro Bird Hunting Game
summary: A Bird Hunt is a fun nod to the retro classic Duck Hunt. You get 3 shots to shoot a bird - shoot all the birds and you advance to the next round. Compete against the world for the top score. Retro classic simplicity.

name: Absolutely: A True Crime Story
summary: A real story, about an actual criminal named Keanu Reeves, made in RPGMaker with stock assets.

name: Absolute: Blazing Infinity
summary: A Xbox 360 port of Blazing Souls. Absolute: Blazing Infinity a tactical role-playing game developed by Idea Factory.

name: Abra Academy: Returning Cast
summary: Abra Academy: Returning Cast is a hidden object game for the PC.

name: About Emma
summary: "I think about you constantly," she says. "Do you think about me too?"

name: Aberrant Rift
summary: Conquer the void in this 3 player coop space combat game with a detailed ship damage model and subsystems

name: Abglantz
summary: Enter a realm of nightmares and claw and shoot your way through hordes of bloodthirsty vermin and things that are much, much worse in this retro FPS

name: Absurd Story: Back Home
summary: A runaway wanderer, a frail Taoist priest, who want to return to their hometown at the end of the world. But when they step into the empty city, they are swept into the dead ruins…

name: A Bonte Christmas
summary: Ho ho ho, it's a tradition here every year that I make a Christmas themed game and it's that time again! I'm presenting my Christmas present for you: a brand new bontegame! Enjoy a Bonte Christmas! Can you complete all 16 levels? Spread the word, share the game and merry puzzling! Cheers!

name: Absence Makes...
summary: A short interactive poem about life & longing whilst working from home.

name: Abunka
summary: Abunka is a strategic action-packed team arena brawler. Experience the unique combination of MOBA meets RTS and challenge your friends in a fast-paced battle for survival. Think smart & act fast for you are the one to decide who wins the battle for existence!

name: Abyss Delvers
summary: Abyss Delvers is an Online Action RPG. Adventure out alone or party up with your friends on an epic journey and fight the monstrous hordes of the Abyss. Featuring randomly generated campaigns, dungeons, items and more!

name: Absolute Poker
summary: magnussoft

name: Abelardo: Steakhouse Musician
summary: Play as Abelardo, a guitar-wielding dinosaur entertaining diners in a bustling steakhouse. Navigate between tables, match each customer’s requested music style, and perform rhythm sequences to earn “meat” while avoiding collisions that can end your run. Built in Unity and originally released as part of the Indies vs PewDiePie jam, it’s a single-player music/arcade experience presented from a top-down perspective.

name: A Beaver's Tale
summary: A cozy, adventure, builder game. Live out the life of Buckey the Beaver: go swimming in the river, build dams, and find treasures! In story mode, learn to protect your beaver kits and become a master builder. Fully customize this colorful and cozy world in builder mode.

name: Abronium Party
summary: Abronium Party is an XNA community game

name: Abrix the robot
summary: Abrix the robot is an addictive puzzle game for everyone. The game provides over 40 hours of intellectual entertainment ranging from fairly simple puzzles, to the extremely difficult, forcing the player to maximum effort. You can also create your own rooms with the editor, make them available in the Steam workshop and invite your friends to play. Challenge them and see if they solve the puzzles designed by you!

name: Above
summary: Above is an aeronautic action-adventure game, in which you fly around exploring islands scattered in a vast ocean, upgrade and modify your aeroplane to progress, in order to find your lost brother and uncover the mystery behind the abominations that dwell beneath the waves.

name: A Bomb's Way
summary: A 2D platformer on Xbox Live Indie Game featuring a new character with a short fuse

name: Abalyte
summary: Abalyte is a 2D-roguelike metroidvania that focuses on the player's skill and inventiveness. While other games have crutches or progression systems that help the player beat the game, Abalyte does the opposite and throws you in a spike-pit.

name: Abuzittin'in Maceraları: Yüzük Arkadaşlığı
summary: In the intro, the developer states that the game “is suitable for ages 9 and up”, “contains unfavourable behaviors” and “contains poop”. Full Turkish solution of the game can be found in Extras.

name: Above the Skies
summary: Dylan is the head of a small village and captain of The Eagle and he takes it upon himself to find The Grail and stop the Falls, saving those he cares for. The journey will be long and perilous, but the whole world above the skies depends on it.

name: Absurd Chess
summary: Compete against up to 100 players in various, REALLY absurd chess modes never seen before! You will have to adapt to new rules and develop your own tactics that will allow you to dominate the board.

name: Abduction Action! Plus
summary: Terrorize humanity with your UFO because you're an alien and what else are you going to do?

name: Abandoned World
summary: Third-person action survival game set in a post-apocalyptic world. After the big disaster you will face bad things

name: A Blurred Line
summary: A Blurred Line is a role-playing game made with RPG Maker 2000.

name: Absurdle
summary: Absurdle is a word guessing game where players must identify a target word which is chosen from the largest existing subset of possible words, based on the already existing information from previous guesses.

name: Able Black
summary: Able Black is an immersive story experience that uses images and sound to guide you through a series of puzzles.

name: Absolute VR Experiences
summary: Immerse yourself into 30 various virtual reality worlds and explore each one into a unique ambiance.

name: About Love, Hate & the Other Ones 2
summary: Influence the game world through LOVE and HATE. Talk to the OTHER ONES and make use of them for the perfect path to the level’s goal. The successor to the popular puzzle game "About Love, Hate & The Other Ones" has reached the third dimension.

name: Absorption
summary: In Absorption, you live by absorbing from enemies. You get score faster when you absorb more enemies at the same time.

name: Abandoned Life
summary: Abandoned Life is a third-person zombie shooter game, where you can complete missions with the help of companions.

name: Abab
summary: This game is too simple "AB Button" Puzzle Game to be not lost!

name: Absin
summary: You take the role of a private investigator tasked with finding a missing woman.

name: A Boy and His Blob DS
summary: This cancelled sequel to the beloved game was shown at E3 2005 by Majesco. The game was to feature 15 different jellybeans and 15 worlds. It was rumoured to be finished, but was never published due to Majesco's financial troubles. It was cancelled in August 2007.

name: A Bad Day
summary: A bad day that never wants to end.

name: Abu's Adventures
summary:
Thinking hard about getting more and more delicious nuts, Squirrel Abu finally decides to take a miraculous adventure that is full of danger.
Thus various traps and obstacles have been planted. Abu will encounter all kinds of little monsters. It is fortunate that Abu, who has zero attacking ability, is helped by brother Box (being forced) along his way, smashing away the little monsters.

name: Abenteuer auf dem Reiterhof: Sonderedition
summary: In this game you take on the role of Annie and your ultimate goal is to win the Kingswood Championship! Of course, before you can succeed, there is a lot for you to do! In addition to the training and many things to discover, the most important task is to take care of your horse. Because if you manage to win the championship, a real surprise is waiting for you!

name: Abstract Grind
summary: A simple short survival roguelite where you build you character by picking up various skills and boons.

name: ABYA: Paint Ball
summary: ABYA: Paint Ball is a challenging 2D platform action-shooter game. The robot ABYA awakens from a dormant pod, following the guidance of AI, wielding a specialized water gun to explore the complex and hazardous underworld for resources, enhance equipment, and open the central elevator.

name: Abandonment
summary: Kevin found his wife missing when he returned home from a business trip. He was worried that his wife would be kidnapped by a "pregnant killer". Kevin decided to set out to find his wife and uncover the truth behind her kidnapping.

name: ABC Search With Me: Extended Edition
summary: Discover new words and learn foreign languages in a fast, easy and fun way! Bundle includes the 'Extra Music Pack'.

name: Above the Waters
summary: You are a lighthouse keeper, living alone with a dog.

name: A Butterfly's Dream
summary: Be a Butterfly in this beautiful and relaxing game with no goals or enemies. Based on a Zen tale.

name: Above & Below
summary: A semi-open world, story-driven RPG about how a search for one girl’s lost memory becomes a desperate struggle to defy prophetic destiny and uncover how the after-effects of a thousands-year-old war reshaped the fates of two intertwined worlds.

name: A.B. Cop
summary: It is the future and motorcycle cops now use air bikes to patrol the streets and catch criminals. You are one cop, and over various missions you are to chase after various criminals and catch them within a time limit. Once all the criminals are caught, you then have to smash into the gang leader within a new time limit, decreasing his energy bar until it is empty. The gameplay of this title is similar to Chase H.Q.. Be careful, as the leader has a weapon and when hit slows you down.

name: Abduction
summary: Abduction is a science-fiction horror game currently in Early Access.

name: Aby Escape Deluxe
summary:
Enjoy Aby Escape at its full potential! 
Aby Escape Deluxe offers you more than 20.000 coins of unlocked content: 
 
- Get instant access to all the story mode level! 
- Change your character with Trump, Sheepard, Suggy, Kastor and Ycell! 
- Keep running further with all power-ups included in the first level: Magnet, Health Ghost Boost and Agility! 
- Enjoy the multiple environments of the game: Winter Rush, GreenStone, Dunderville and the famous Route 66,5! 
 
Run Aby! Ruuuun! 
 
Aby Escape is a free race game operating completely in 3D and offering varied gameplay, which will require you to be as quick as you can. Help Aby, the unluckiest and clumsiest raccoon, in his mad race to escape from his assailants. Whether being pursued by the hunters in his native forest, by the police in town or by the bikers on Route 66.5, Aby never stops running to escape from all these dangers. 
 
Take a look far ahead and make your way through the 2 game modes: 
 
UNLIMITED MODE 
Aby Escape offers an unlimited game mode devoted specifically to scoring. Slide, jump and accelerate to dodge all the obstacles in your path! Collect coins and unlock loads of power-ups. Achieve the best score you can and complete 50 exclusive challenges. 
 
STORY MODE 
In Aby Escape, progress through the 30 levels of the game, split across 3 different universes, and take on every kind of obstacle and unique situation: a catapult, an American football stadium, elephants, trucks, and a cemetery, just to name a few. Get an overview of the next update by completing Story mode. 
 
Features : 
 
-50 challenges to take on in Unlimited mode 
-30 game levels in Story mode 
-Lots of enemies to shake off or avoid (hunters, policemen, bikers, footballers, elephants, etc.) 
-Lots of power-ups available (Ghost, Magnet, Extra life, Shield, etc.) 
-Objects to unlock (characters, shoes, etc.) 
 
But watch out and don’t get hit in the face by a tree, elephant or American footballer! 
 
Discover the free Aby Escape game available now!

name: Abyssal Fall
summary:
Abyssal Fall is a fast paced arena action game where every tile of the arena will fall one second after you step on it.

Trap, bait & pressure your opponents in order to make them do a mistake and punish them with your special ability.

name: Absolver: Adalian Forest Pack
summary: The Adalian Forest Pack contains the Forest Caller Chief and Forest Lead Dancer equipment, Starnight Sword, and five new emotes

name: Abedot Family Estate: Search For Hidden Objects
summary: A game in the genre of "hidden object", in which you have to explore an old family mansion. Luxurious rooms, a library full of mysterious volumes, a winter garden and a creepy dungeon - explore locations, collect clues and beware of shadows in the corners!

name: Absolute
summary: Absolute is an escape game. Experience a unique puzzle on every level. Make use of any available tools to solve the puzzles and clear all the levels.

name: Abandoned Hospital VR
summary:
You have to escape from this insane place. 
Oculus Rift required to play.

name: Absolut deadmau5
summary: Join electronic music superstar deadmau5 as he goes on an epic night out. Visit his studio, and then navigate him through a series of gameplay challenges, ending with you standing next to him in the booth as he plays his latest track.

name: Abigail Fortune and the Scarlet Fairy
summary: A story about an adventure of a modern-day gentleman thief.

name: A Bomb Called Darkipt
summary: The third game released by Gretchen, also known as BrownSugar, creator of both A Vague Story and Patty & Mr. Miles in Wolf RPG Editor.

name: Absurd
summary:
A fast-paced comedy card game fueled by the freaky humor of you and your friends. Fire back answers to far out prompts to make your friends laugh and win their votes. Build your deck from hundreds of cards. Collect cards ranging from rare to ultra rare to just bizarre. Match wits with friends and foes for hilarious online multiplayer action. Perfect for a quick game or hours of play, Absurd lets you show off your funny side and rewards you for not making sense.
Absurd’s multiplayer game play is so simple it’s addictive, but the laughs come from you. Absurd throws out a random question, category or fill-in-the-blank, and you and your friends hustle to answer with cards from your deck, then vote on the winner for each round. An average match lasts minutes, but with collectible cards and the ability to customize your deck, Absurd gives you trillions of ways to keep your friends laughing for hours!

name: ABC Coloring Town
summary: ABC Coloring Town offers a creative playground for children and is a fun way to learn Basic English pronunciation and words. Explore and learn letters from the alphabet as you visit cute houses full of pretty pictures to paint.

name: Abnormal world: Season One
summary: In this big abnormal world, there is not enough food. Your task is to feed the inhabitants of this world.

name: Abysm 2: Spirit Falcon
summary: Abysm 2: Spirit Falcon is an Expansion for the GZDoom mod Abysm 2: Infernal Contract. Includes a new singleplayer Campaign with new Weapons, Starting Equipment, Monsters and Quests as well as the Return of the Bounty system from Abysm 1.

name: Abscess
summary: A game about giving.

name: Abunai Josei Shinrigaku Nyuumon
summary:
A kinetic novel comprising of four very short erotic stories about 15 screens each dwelling on female psychology.

Each scenario ends in about three minutes. It's more like a work that is closer to a CG collection.

name: Able Archer: Red Crucible 2
summary: Red Crucible 2 is originally a browser-based, unity 3d supported "MMOFPS" game by Rocketeers Game studio.

name: Abstrrkt Explorers
summary: A turn-based city-building strategy game for Android.

name: Abrupt Valley
summary: Welcome to Abrupt Valley, a competitive 1v1 city building/auto battler game. Create your city, upgrade your buildings, prepare you army and watch it fight your enemies. Optimize your city, adapt to your opponent and climb the ladder!

name: Absoloot
summary: Absoloot is a game with familiar game mechanics that will put you into fun confrontation of four warring sides. The reason of confrontation is a treasure!

name: Abandoned Drive-in
summary: The main character Kaori is on a date boyfriend suggests that they go on a test of courage. The destination is an abandoned drive-in. They hear a noise in the ruins and stops. Is there already someone there?

name: Abandon02
summary: When a android named AI marryed with human, she woke up and rebuilt humans.

name: ABC Search With Me: Adventure Bundle
summary: Do you want to go on an adventure in search of hidden words scattered around the world? Hop in the balloon and set off with our friends!

name: Abby Héroes en apuros
summary: Abby, a girl endowed with amazing powers, and her friend Paul, will find themselves trapped with Clavoman, the most famous superhero on television, in a thrilling journey that will lead them to the very underwater base of Professor Hammer, a mad scientist obsessed with the superhero.

name: Abstract Ritual
summary:
You are searching for the entrance to the secret world.
You are just a natural explorer I guess. It's cool.

Please excuse the spirit monsters being a bit mean, they are just stressed out.

name: Ablaze Ascent
summary: A speedrunning-focused vertical precision platformer

name: Abysm 2: Pharaoh's Judgement
summary: Abysm 2: Pharaoh's Judgement is an Expansion for the GZDoom mod Abysm 2: Infernal Contract. Includes a new singleplayer Campaign with new Weapons, Monsters and Quests.

name: Aboard the Adventure
summary: Aboard the adventure is a humorous adventure game in which you will be part of the team of the daring Captain Quinn, with the objective of defeating the sinister Professor Weaver in a race to get several ancient and mysterious artifacts that can change the destiny of the world.

name: Abby y El Secreto de Gordonne
summary: Abby is a young girl endowed with amazing powers, received after the impact of a meteorite against the garden of her house. Now she, along with her friend Paul, must discover the secret hidden by Gordonne, an evil businessman, who intends to demolish the school where they both study.

name: Aby's Playground
summary: Do you want to roam in an open world, discover new things, find new weapons, kill monsters and upgrade your character?

name: A Broken Halo
summary: A Broken Halo is a 2D Puzzle game. You play as Zime, an angel that had her Halo destroyed by an evil mage. Now, she has to recover the broken pieces of her Halo and destroy her nemesis. Is Zime going to survive this challenge?

name: Abstract Driver
summary: Abstract Driver is a 1-person game where you have to move inside a cylindrical space. This game is a dynamic action game in which you have to control the camera to the rhythmic music and score points. If you collect a certain number of points, you get achievements.

name: Absorb
summary: Absorb is a reverse horror game in which you navigate through a series of sci-fi environments devouring all the astronauts, soldiers, and cyberpunk heroes you come across.

name: Abyss of Empires:The Mythology
summary: Abyss of Empires is a strategy game where you build and rule your own land, explore unknown territories, and fight for survival. Choose from different civilizations, recruit and command Heroes with unique skills, and assemble units for battle. With numerous maps and endless strategic possibilities, you’ll lead your empire to victory against enemies.

name: Abribus
summary:
As a ghost, help people resolve the problems that held them in the limbs by diving into their thoughts.

◉ A zen atmosphere with cute graphics
◉ Help people reorganizing their thoughts by entering inside their mind
◉ Features 16 levels, more than 30 different characters and a Time Attack mode

name: ABC Flappy
summary: Learn how to spell and assemble words to unlock prizes. You can trace and colour the letters of the alphabet too. Swoop deeply into this amazing adventure alongside Albert, the eager for knowledge albatross, flying through the many levels to save his silly friends while learning the alphabet.

name: Abo Mando
summary: Have fun accompanying the young from the beyond to the future but first you have to fight with mythical entities of Mexican horror. A really hardcore game for the new gamers. Take the challenge!

name: Absolute Reversi
summary: This reversi game is for all players at any level.

name: Aby Escape
summary: Help poor Aby, the unluckiest and clumsiest raccoon, escape from his assailants. Whether being pursued by the hunters in his native forest, by the police in town or by the bikers on Route 66.5, Aby never stops running to escape from all these dangers.

name: Abridged
summary: Abridged is a strategy board game where the goal is to connect to any two opposite edges of the 8x8 board by placing pieces to form a continuous bridge. Defeat your opponents by building over them and connecting your path first.

name: ABC Monday Night Football
summary: ABC Sports and Data East team up to take you to the gridiron! Strap on your helmet, put that black stuff under your eyes and prepare yourself for football, Frank Gifford style! Features AFB voice synthesis technology.

name: A Bumpy Ride
summary: Take a jaunt into the world of A Bumpy Ride, a casual train-driving and exploration game! Inspired by railroading of the 19th century with a whimsical spin, you'll adventure around the open frontier in your trusty little train, picking up passengers and freight.

name: Abcop: A.B. Cop
summary: The player takes on the role of the A.B. (Air Bike) Cop who must chase down and destroy the perpetrators of various crimes (which changes every level) before the time limit expires. A.B Cop introduced an element new to the racing genre: the end-of-level guardian.

name: Abraxas Interactive's Push
summary: Push is a really hard top-down push block game that is a love letter to classic top-down push block puzzle games.

name: Abyss Signal: Expedition
summary: Since ancient times, there have been legends about an underwater civilization hidden from the eyes of people in the abyss of the Ocean. The stories would have remained legends until a strange artifact fell into the fishermen’s net, indicating that we are not the only intelligent beings.

name: Abacus Finch
summary: Play as Abacus Finch or Abbie Finch to track down and find out what has happened to the dreaded Pterofractal egg taken by Pigeonacci.

name: A Business Power
summary: Can you Become the Number One?

name: A Beautiful Ride to Carlisle
summary: A gentle, romantic story of two girls meeting on the train.

name: Absolute BrickBuster
summary: The classic brick game comes back as DSiWare.

name: Abyss
summary: Now Harry Bow has really done it! You're good. But are you skilled enough to find all eight Quake-O-Mates, and push each of them to a Swirl-Away Garbage Disposal? It's just you and your Anadome versus Harry Bow and his nasties. Are you up to the challenge? A colorful, fast-paced arcade style game featuring four levels of scrolling, super-bitmap game-play, a save game feature and a high-score table. Warning: Fast reflexes and quick thinking required.

summary: Survive in high Earth orbit on a damaged space station after a global calamity. Craft equipment, perform dangerous EVA maneuvers and repair the station.

name: Absence
summary:
Absence will have you checking over your shoulders and double looking at everything from the moment you get swept up in it.

You've awakened in a bathroom, only knowing that someone has left to the main office to get you help.
What were you doing there? Where is there?
There is a strange sense of something missing around you.

summary: It's just one of these nights for a witch... let's just get this zombie apocalypse over with and go back to bed, okay?
