name: ABPA Backgammon
summary: Intellivision Backgammon is identical with the board game. Backgammon is a game played by two players (the computer can be one of the players). Each player has 15 pieces. The object of the game is to be the first to move all your pieces completely around and finally off the board. Moving your pieces off the board is called "bearing off". The first player to bear off all his pieces is the winner. Each player moves in a direction beginning from his opponent's Home Table and coming around to his own Home Table. Thus one player always moves clockwise and the other always counterclockwise. You can play against the computer at two skill levels - one for beginners or intermediate, another for experts - or two players can compete against each other. It displays the American Backgammon Players Association (ABPA) logo.

name: ABC: Audioreactive Beat Circle
summary: Experience a new way to listen your favourite music. Audio-reactive arcade game where you avoid being hit by abstract shapes. The shapes move slower or faster depending on the audio.

name: A Butterfly
summary:
Part horror part interactive poem about overcoming, and bittersweet surrender.
A Butterfly is part of a larger project, BlueSuburbia, but was released as a standalone because it's very big.

name: A Brief History of the World
summary:
Take a sweeping ride through the history of mankind in the famous board game from Ragnar Brothers! Control the decisions of major leaders and conquer the world!
Lead your empire to victory in this turn-based strategy game! Play as the character of Julius Caesar, Genghis Khan, or Napoleon Bonaparte and command armies through 6 riveting epochs in history, with 42 major empires and 15 minor empires. Choose from over 40 event cards to enhance replayability and alter the course of history. All set to an epic soundtrack (or listen to tracks from your own music library) with beautiful graphics and original artwork from the Ragnar Brothers’ board game. With no setup time required, no pieces to lose, and no arguments about the rules, the future of board games is here and A Brief History of the World gives you exactly what you want -- to play!

name: ABC Wide World of Sports Boxing
summary:
ABC Wide World Of Sports Boxing is a boxing computer game released in 1991. The game allows for more than just boxing, letting the player create and then train and manage their own character. It is based on the American Broadcasting Company (ABC) program Wide World of Sports and was released at the time of the program's 30th anniversary. Sportscaster Dan Dierdorf, then a boxing commentator for ABC, is featured in this game.

The game was known in the European market as TV Sports Boxing, part of Cinemaware's TV Sports series and was published by Mindscape.

name: Abarenbou Princess
summary: Follow the adventures of the rowdy princess of the Silver Bell Kingdom, Rouge, in this PS2 RPG.

name: AbyssalCraft
summary: AbyssalCraft is an eldritch horror mod for Minecraft centered around exploration, with growing magic and Lovecraftian influences.

name: Abbigale and the Monster
summary:
Join Abbigale in a journey to heal the mental madness within herself. 
 
This is a top-down puzzle game where you control both Abbigale and the monster.

name: Absolutely Perfect Specimen
summary: Absolutely Perfect Specimen is a horror-yuri visual novel about the android maid Pan and her master Dr. Amy G Dala. Follow Pan over the course of a year as she struggles with insatiable hunger and bizarre dysphoria, all while discovering her past and grappling with her dark future.

name: Abatron
summary: Abatron, a Multiplayer Action Strategy pc game. Strategy combined with shooter gameplay mechanics. Switch from first person, to third person, or topdown...

name: Aberration
summary: Aberration, a point & click thriller experience that will lead you down a rabbit hole of suspense, fear and misdirection. Roam through the creaking halls of an abandoned mansion, with secrets buried in the walls. Trudge through a muddied farm property and find what's hidden amongst the hay.

name: Abyssal Descent
summary: Embark on an epic platforming adventure through treacherous caves and mysterious realms in Abyssal Descent. Battle enemies, solve puzzles, and unlock hidden secrets as you journey through procedurally generated underground worlds. With optional local co-op, share this adventure with a friend.

name: Abiko the Miko
summary: Japanese female shaman fight against "yokai"! This is a shooting action game!

name: Abyss Manager Idle
summary: Abyss Manager Idle is an incremental tower defence game. Fend off assaults from two worlds, recruit and develop your personnel in an endless cycle of time. Defeat the calamity emerging from the abyss at the year's end to break the endless gyre.

name: Abbie's Farm
summary: Help Abbie feed the animals or bake a tasty cake. The farm has lots of animals that want to be cared for. Their food grows in the yard, and Abbie can draw water from the well. Children playfully learn what to feed to each animal. But don't worry if they aren't fed or given water for a few days - they can take care of themselves as well! The following places can be visited on the farm: The Pigsty: Home to a family of three pigs, happily romping in the mud, waiting to be stroked and given lots of food. The Stable: Abbie's beloved horse lives here, and is happy to receive any attention. The stable is also where the farmyard cat tries his luck at catching mice. Despite the presence of the horse and the cat, there are a lot of mice, which are difficult to catch. The Garden: This is where all the food grows for the animals on Abbie's farm - carrots, apples, cabbage, beets, corn, grass, strawberries and more. After the fruit and other crops have been harvested, it takes a little while until they grow back again. The scarecrow keeps thieving birds away from the crops. The Well: This is where Abbie draws water to give to the animals, for example. The powers of deduction and logic of little farmers are challenged by everyday tasks: for example, to collect water, the bucket must first be found and then used with the well. The Hen House: Three chickens are clucking away all…

name: Absolute Chess
summary: Chess for DsiWare

name: Absolute Color Perception
summary: Absolute color sense is a very test of color sense eye game. Among the many colors, can you tell which one is different?

name: Absolute Adventure Zero
summary:
Absolute Adventure Zero is a role playing game set in a different (fictional) dimension, 
it's graphics and sound department are inspired by older games of the same genre. 
In this game you fight an insane mage,and his evil beings,to stop their evil plan.

name: Absolver: Special Reserve edition
summary: Absolver: Special Reserve edition features a Prospect Mask with a display base, a 52-page artbook, as well as an Absolver sticker pack. But, if you pre-order for a PlayStation, you will get a limited physical copy of the game. Steam users, however, will be sent a key that will unlock a full game. The special edition of Absolver costs $75, and there are 3,250 PC copies, as well as 3,250 PS4 copies.

name: Abaddon
summary: A tower defense shmup for Xbox Live Arcade.

name: Abyss the Forgotten Past
summary: Abyss The Forgotten Past, is a 2D platform game with RPG-based mechanics, with a large diversity of collectible items, increasing the difficulty as you progress. The story is based on rediscovering itself, after an unfortunate event, Leonnor sets out on a journey to discover everything about his past, with special abilities, where monsters, magic and heavenly beings exist. Enter a personal search that will surprise you with each discovery ...

name: A Boy and His Beard
summary:
A Boy and His Beard is a fast-paced beard fighting experience that lets you steal the beards of your enemies!

Survive waves of bearded foes as you collect as many beards and achievements as possible!

name: A Blastastic Love Story: KiriBaku
summary: Created by fans for fans.

name: Abbys Endless Adventure
summary: Abbys Endless Adventure

name: Abnormal Treatment
summary: Strange events occur at a sanatorium for those with unusual abilities. Follow clues, solve puzzles, and uncover the truth. What will be released when all secrets are revealed? Goodness? Or… pure ”Evil”?

name: A Bard's Last Song
summary: Embark on a thrilling journey with three unlikely heroes in this epic action RPG. Traverse treacherous landscapes, confront formidable foes, and uncover dark secrets as you strive to reunite a fractured kingdom. Band together to save the land from chaos, all in a stylized vector style.

name: Abstacked
summary: Abstacked is an XNA community game available over Xbox Live Marketplace. It is a puzzle game.

name: ABC Hunt
summary: Learn the alphabet in a fun way! Collect all letters in the correct order! Suitable for children 3-7 years old!

name: Abstract
summary: Abstract is a third person, cooperative or player versus player online action game set in an evolving sci-fi world. Yes, we have rockets and lasers! Yes, we have kill-streaks! Of course we have zombies! Why not?

name: Abyss
summary: Abyss is an arcade-adventure game telling the story of a teenager who sets off on a dangerous and obstacle-filled journey. Take part in this thrilling adventure, explore 21 different levels, from the gloomy streets of Łódź to the infernal dungeons.

name: A Bee Sees
summary:
The happy, balloon popping bee helps kids learn Letters, Numbers, and Colors. With easy to use controls, even the youngest child can tap the screen of the iPhone or iPod touch to pop the correct balloon.

Voice instructions tell the child what to pick, then they touch the balloon for the bee to pop.

name: Abductor
summary: Abductor is a side view single screen shooter where you control a spacecraft at the bottom of the screen, moving left or right, and you have to blast and destroy all aliens that appear in various formations above. Below your craft are six humans and you must stop them being taken by swooping aliens to the top of the screen and if they reach the top, they turn into skulls and fall down the screen. If you are hit by an alien or falling skull then you lose one of three lives but if you lose all the humans then it is game over.

name: Abracadabra
summary:
Abracadabra is another part in Once Upon A Time series and interactive book for kids similar to another part in the series Baba Yaga. 
 
Some time have passed since the dragon brought a child to one of the four houses in the kingdom. Child has grown and became a brave guy. One night his parents went out of home for some reason, and evil wizard Satanicus stole the very precious item of your parents. To do not make your parents upset, you decide to return this item. 
 
During the 7 chapters you'll switch between three modes of the game: 
1) Searching an object in first-person view via point and click; 
2) Move through the forest, jumping, ducking, and using a weapon in third-person side view; 
3) Fighting with the one of big bosses in first-person view via point and click. 
 
Three difficulty levels are available. Finishing the game, player may replay the game starting from the one of four certain game parts. The game is available in English, Spanish, German, Italian, and French languages.

name: A Blast from the Past
summary: A Blast from the Past is a stunning, classic arcade shooter. Includes gameplay modes for the casual gamer through to "Tournament Mode" for Hi-Score hunters! With 4K/360Hz+ support, experience smooth as silk gameplay in this dazzling arcade blaster with something for every arcade-going fan!

name: Abscission
summary:
Abscission is a dark and moody 32-map vanilla megawad with an original ambient/noise soundtrack composed by me.
Each map loosely follows the style of the original iwad levels, but with distinct and new layouts rather than being a remake. Visuals are classic since I stuck to stock textures other than custom skies.
The difficulty is slightly above average - expect difficult fights that don't become tedious or frustrating.

name: Absolute Matter
summary: Absolute Matter is a tactical extraction shooter all about player interaction. In this high stakes PvX game both the players and the environment dynamically create quests.

name: Abrapalabra: La Magia de Aprender a Leer
summary: The software Abrapalabra was designed for children between 6 to 11 years old to develop their skills of writing and reading. It is a complete software with 2 CDs full of interactive activities to develop these skills.

name: Abda Redeemer: Space Alien Invasion
summary: Our brave hero Abda lost his father. After his death, he remained the only one of his kind. Everyone he loved died. After the funeral, he inherited his father's old starship. After fixing the flying saucer he had inherited, Abda got ready to go. Thus began the story of Abda Redeemer.

name: Absolute Zero
summary: A race known as the Snastipods has destroyed the Earth and enslaved its population. Your quest is to help Samantha Snark AKA "Sammy" survive on the Absolute Zero Space Station, end Snastipod tyranny and invoke revenge for the people of Earth.

name: A Better Schlo Dating Simulation
summary:
Have you ever wondered what a schlo dating simulation would be like if it was better? Find out by playing a better schlo dating simulation!

Help Oran get a boyfriend in a short, fun dating sim that doesn't even need a trigger warning! (There is slight mention of "adult" things, but nothing too dark!) With 12 different endings, the game should be a good hour worth of fun!

name: Abracadaball
summary: A mobile puzzle game by Gameloft.

name: Abalon Arena
summary: Cards, tactics and mutant squirrels! Enter the arena and compete head to head, play cooperatively or go it alone to defeat increasingly challenging onslaughts of enemies in a cunning game of wits set in the fantastical world of Abalon.

name: Abrasion
summary: Abrasion is a short exploration-focused horror game set inside an ancient megastructure.

name: Absolute Drift: Zen Edition
summary:
A unique racing game about mastering the art of drifting.

Journey from apprentice to master drifter as you hone your skill in a gorgeous minimalist world. Travel from airports and docks to a floating metropolis in search of new cars and ever greater challenges. Chill out to over 3 hours of electronic music by C41 and NYTE. Push yourself to the limit on drifting tracks and wild mountain roads while you work to unlock the elite Midnight events. Your driving skills will be challenged at every turn until you finally become a master drifter.

name: Abyssal
summary: A 3D turn-based strategy game where a Monk, wielding arcane magic, and his minions battle hordes of Eldritch-like creatures.

name: Abraca
summary: Now is the time for justice! In this Roguelite game, players will be able to learn spells, strengthen skills, use the currency obtained from battles to purchase items from mysterious merchants, kill numerous demon claws, and ultimately conquer this world!

name: Abnormal State: Otome Love
summary:
Summertime is here, and so is the love of your life!

In this otome game, you'll wake up in a certain game and find yourself surrounded by three guys who want you. But there's a catch: you'll die if you don't find true love!

name: ABZoo
summary: ABZoo is a Children's educational puzzle game created by Excalibur Computing & Learning.

name: Abomiracers
summary: Abomiracers is a multiplayer party action game, where you assemble your character from different body parts made of clay and fight to become the King of the Hill!

name: ABC Paint
summary: A VR drawing app as easy as ABC. No clever hologram-menus or impressive lazer-pointer interactions - just You, the brush, palette and an endless canvas. Suitable for any age.

name: A buggy Adventure
summary: A game about a ghost, which has to avoid spikes by moving up, down and using bugs.

name: Abyss
summary: Guide Nep2no through the depths to find new resources so humanity can survive.

name: Abduction Episode 1: Her Name Was Sarah
summary: You wake up in the middle of the night and realize you’re not alone. Armed with your wits, make it through your apartment and survive the ABDUCTION.

name: Absorb Invader
summary: Play as alien microorganism and untilize local life to earn DNA and evolve. Absorb smaller cells, feed your cell to grow bigger and purchase upgrades for earned DNA between jumps. Go deeper to find bigger cells and more DNA and food to earn.

name: Abandoned
summary: Atmospheric First Person Horror

name: A Bar Where Men Go To Be Turned Into Horses
summary: 5 men. 5 shots. 10 minutes until transformation.

name: Abadox: The Deadly Inner War
summary: Abadox is a video game for the NES, subtitled The Deadly Inner War. It is a side-scrolling shoot 'em up in the vein of Gradius and R-Type. The game is notable for its unique visual design, as the game takes place inside the intestinal tract of a giant alien organism. Abadox is also known to be difficult, since it takes one hit from an enemy projectile to be killed. In Abadox, if a player is killed, one must restart from a checkpoint passed before death.

name: Absolute Fall
summary: A unique experiment in an abstract world with fully hand-drawn graphics. Jump, shoot, collect. Sounds banal?

name: Abyss of the Sacrifice
summary:
Set after the demise of a city deep underground, Misshitsu no Sacrifice tells the story of five young girls to attempt to escape and the friendships, enmity, and horror they experience along the way.

Players must solve a variety of puzzles to find out what the future holds for the young girls in this atmospheric tale of family, friendship, and betrayal that unfolds behind closed doors.

name: Abyssmare
summary: Abyssmare is a near future science fiction world view based on the Cthulhu Mythos world view, and an action game based on Roguelite+first person shooting. In this game, you will battle against the crazy "Super Soldiers" and monsters, as well as the Great Old Ones.

name: Abyss Looters
summary: Abyss Looters is a cooperative extraction dungeon crawler game, for 1-4 players. Explore Abyss dungeons with friends, avoid traps and dangerous monsters, collect artifacts, build your own adventure guild!

name: About Cannons & Sparrows
summary: Prepare yourself for a visually stunning Metroidvania adventure that delivers a cinematic look and an engaging storytelling experience. Embark on a thrilling journey as a small cannon who hatches from a bird's egg, unaware of its true potential.

name: A Bear's Night Out
summary: Tomorrow is the big Teddy Bear party, and you must definitely not let your owner forget about it...

name: Absentis
summary: Adventure game with RPG elements in which you have to take on the role of a young and ambitious traveler named Jack, for whom a trip to a frightening, but alluring island with its secrets turned out to have completely unexpected consequences.

name: Abandoned Hut
summary: Explore scary places in this first-person horror game. Interact with characters, solve puzzles and discover that bad intentions can lead to catastrophic consequences.

name: A Belief in a Perfect Today
summary:
This is the story of a day that we wanted to be perfect. A bank holiday trip to Brighton with friends. A chance to see the ocean, to see a band, to see slot machines and eat doughnuts.

This is a story of a day that wasn't perfect. A day of fighting through hangovers, of trying to have a good time, of putting up with bad weather, of trying not to snap.

This is a story. It focuses on the cracks.

name: Abraxas
summary: 1999. Four childhood friends (Clarice, Afonso, Sabrina and Marcos) decide to get together in a country house to reminisce about the good old days. However, at nightfall, Clarice proposes a dangerous prank to the group... Something seems to have gone terribly wrong.

name: ABC Monday Night Football '98
summary: ABC Sports MNF 98 is the sophomore effort by ABC Sports and OT Sports.

name: Absent
summary: Absent is the first freeware release from FNGames. Originally released in 2013, the game makes its' Steam debut this year.

name: A.B.Cop Air Bike
summary: The player takes on the role of the A.B. (Air Bike) Cop who must chase down and destroy the perpetrators of various criminals (that changes every level) before the time limit expires. A.B Cop introduced an element new to the racing genre: the end-of-level guardian.

name: Absence: Verdict of Silence
summary: A Turn-Based Adventure RPG based in the land of Asalthana.

name: Abyss Survivors
summary: Abyss Survivors - a casual game where the corrupted ocean breeds ferocious creatures. Wield your Sutando abilities to defeat them. Dive deeper, level up, and acquire powerful gear. Utilize elemental reactions strategically!

name: A Blocky Christmas
summary: You are a star, you are magnetic. Can you complete all 16 levels? Merry puzzling!

name: Abuga Warp Zone
summary: Play as Abuga through nearly 50 challenging but exciting levels. Warping through and making your way from start to finish. Be careful though, not all warps are there to help you and who knows what other obstacles lay ahead as you progress further. Enjoy your stay at the Warp Zones in StrangePlace!

name: ABC Sports Indy Racing
summary: ABC Sports Indy Racing is a racing computer game officially licensed by the Indy Racing League.

name: Abyssal Zone
summary: Abyssal Zone is a tile-based puzzler which incorporates a distinctive mechanic: you can only turn clockwise. Go solo and make your way through puzzles while being watched by two entities, or bring a friend along and play the exclusive co-op stages.

name: Above
summary: ABOVE is a challenging climbing game set in a mysterious world. Reach, jump and grab on to rocks and moving objects as you pave your way through the vertical terrain. Experience a mysterious and intriguing world with gameplay that will challenge both your skills and endurance.

name: Aberration Town
summary: The end of the world is coming soon! Survive among endless zombies!

name: Abyss
summary:
An Expanded version of the original on Nintendo DSi.
Abyss is an arcade-adventure game telling the story of a teenager who sets off on a dangerous and obstacle-filled journey. Take part in this thrilling adventure, explore 21 different levels, from the gloomy streets of ód to the infernal dungeons. You will be lead by the guide all the way, which will help you to complete all tasks. This one will not be easy...

name: Abracadabra
summary: Abracadabra is a conversational adventure video game divided in two parts

name: Abducted Toad
summary:
Abducted Toad is an unofficial fan game starring Toad from the Mario series.

Toad has been abducted by aliens! Now, with the help of a friendly alien who grants him spectacular powers, Toad must overthrow the evil King Purplius and restore peace to the alien world! But there may be more to the situation than meets the eye...

Blast your way through over 30 levels as you explore the strange world of Planet Purplius on your quest to bring down the evil king! Collect all the info discs hidden throughout the levels! Featuring an original soundtrack by K16!

name: Abstractanks
summary: Abstractanks is an action-packed real-time-strategy game with an abstract theme. Play intense skirmishes with up to sixteen teams, where map-control, positioning, decision-making, speed and a little bit of luck are rewarded.

name: A Bird's Tale
summary: Help keep a happy home in this short hand-crafted platformer telling a touching tale about a bird, it's children and their home.

name: Abyss Odyssey
summary:
There are only two constants in Abyss Odyssey: a great evil awaits at the bottom of the pit, and you must succeed or die.

From indie Chilean developer ACE Team comes a new side-scrolling action adventure game featuring a complex fighting engine in procedurally generated levels that destines its three warriors to battle for an eternity. Enter the bold Katrien, the tortured specter Ghost Monk, and the ethereal Pincoya. Use the characters to perform combos, chaining attacks and releasing a flurry of blows in order to survive what lies beneath. Your path into the unknown may start out with three fierce warriors, but when you learn to possess your enemies, you can challenge the abyss with their skills and combat abilities. Each foe is as technically complex as the main warriors, so use all the options available to you and attempt to figure out the infinite abyss.

name: Abode
summary:
In Abode you'll visit a Sci-fi noir apartment. Inspired by "escape the room" games.
You will pick up, inspect, open, repair or utilize objects or furniture in the room in order to unveil all its secrets.

name: Abduction
summary: A custom story for Amnesia: The Dark Descent in which you once again take on the role of Daniel, roughly one year after his ordeal at Brennenburg. Daniel has been doing quite well since his escape, but one night, a loud crash awakens him. It is up to you to investigate the source of the disturbance, and find out what it all means.

name: ABC Follow Me: Food Festival
summary: ABC Follow Me is the perfect game for kids to write their first words and learn the alphabet, numbers, foods and English!

name: A Better Mouse Trap
summary: A Point And Click Adventure Game created by Dave Gilbert as part of the Reality-On-The-Norm project.

name: Abstracto
summary: Abstracto is a Retro-Inspired, Hack N' Slash, Combat-Oriented Platformer, with a deep combat system that lets you play your way. Play as Forte a blue square on a quest to defeat the evil Immotus and save the strange land of the Abstract.

name: Abolish
summary: This is a delightful pixel-style adventure game set in a world of yellow land and blue sky, where you embark on an adventure as a Corgi puppy.

name: Abnormality
summary: Abnormality is an authentic & realistic multiplayer ghost-hunting horror game. Explore fully abandoned locations, investigate, and find evidence of the paranormal, but beware—the former residents may not appreciate your intrusion. Use night vision goggles to navigate through the pitch darkness.

name: Abnormal 1999: The Compass and the Sand
summary: The fate of exile, like an endless river, carries Ann to a distant and unfamiliar land. A flame of unwavering determination burns within Ann's heart. She knows that one day, either Sam or SU will surely find her. Until then, Ann must find a way to escape this place.

name: Abandoned City
summary: Welcome to the abandoned city. All that's left in this city are zombies, and maybe they're interested in you. At the moment you are isolated, sure to die, but you have to hold on for as long as you can. Do you happen to know if someone will see your desperate uprising and rescue you..

name: Abyssal Wrath
summary: Abyssal Wrath is a frenetic, merciless top-down shooter, set on a eldritch science fiction universe.

name: Abducted
summary: Play as the socially rejected host of ETRadio, desperate to discover alien life while being mocked for answering hoax sighting calls - until one turns out to be terrifyingly real. When the call comes in, will it be the air that goes dead - or will it be you?

name: Absurdika
summary: It's time for you to overcome the fear of conflicts. Every time someone blamed you you stood quiet and kept your anger inside. The demon you are about to face impersonates this fear.

name: A Burned Man Walks Down The Desolate Corridor
summary: Taking place in an Alternate Universe, the plot begins in 2036 where Apollo Justice and Kristoph Gavin are investigating a mysterious letter warning them about the impending death of Amelia Wonderley that appeared at their office. Things take a turn for the worse when they track down the sender to the office of Private Detective Joseph Sternwood, whose corpse is found in his locked office.

name: A Bee Movie Game But Every Time You Beat It It Gets Faster
summary: exactly what it says on the tin

name: Abel: Shin Mokushiroku Taisen
summary: Abel is a turn-based Japanese-style RPG set in a dark futuristic environment. The player commands Abel and his teammates from the headquarters, where they can rest, receive items, and prepare for the next mission. The missions themselves take place in large dungeon-like areas. Randomly appearing enemies must be defeated in first-person perspective combat with a rather standard system: characters either attack physically, use items, or execute special attacks that require "special points" (equivalent to magic). There is also an Auto option for battles.

name: A Burger in Space
summary: Take on the role of Big B and pilot a unique spaceship in the shape of a burger through infinite space!

name: Above the Stars
summary: Discover new worlds and build up mighty defences as you find your new home Above the Stars!

name: ABBA: You Can Dance
summary: ABBA: You Can Dance is a dance video game for the Wii, developed by Ubisoft. The game is a spin-off of the Just Dance series. The game includes a "Karaoke Mode" which allows 2 players to sing via USB microphones. However, not all of the songs are singable.

name: Abaddon's Veil
summary: Abaddon's Veil is a short dread-driven space submarine horror game inspired by Iron Lung.

name: Abalon
summary: Abalon is a roguelike adventure that fuses tactical turn-based combat and card strategy. Choose your summoner and explore a tabletop world to discover its secrets. Build the perfect deck, outsmart your enemies and become legend!

name: Abunai Tengu Densetsu
summary: Abunai Tengu Densetsu is an adventure game with menu-based navigation and input. Most screens offer a fairly long list of verb commands, some of which must be combined with objects or persons selected from a sub-menu in order to interact with the environment. The game allows the player to visit many different rooms and other locations in any order; however, certain events must be triggered in order to advance, sometimes by repeatedly selecting commands. Certain situations require the player to find items and use them in a different location.

name: Abyss Dive
summary: Abyss Dive is a 2D side-view game where the player as a diver explores the ocean and with the help of his harpoon, can break air shells, fend off underwater monsters, and also fight his way to a mysterious treasure!

name: A Blocc World
summary: A voxel-style open-world RPG. Use a variety of melee, ranged and magical combat abilities to smash your way to saving the world. Grow your strength, with powerful abilities and equipment. Learn about the world of Blocc from friendly characters, and try to keep them in one piece.

name: ABC Match with Me
summary: A great introduction to puzzle games for your child that develops logical thinking, problem solving and many other skills from early childhood! Smart interface designed in a child-friendly style will allow your child to enjoy the game as soon as they start it!

name: Abomi Nation
summary: Abomi Nation is a monster-collecting roguelike RPG. Every new save file will create a totally unique version of Abomi Nation and provide different Abomis for you to find. You can battle with them, play games, and watch them bond with each other as your adventure unfolds in a way totally unique to you!

name: Above the Hill
summary: A hicker twists his foot in a dangerous curve in a mountain and finds himself in an unknown area, Injured and lost all he can do is search for a shelter that protects him from dangeous animals.

name: A Bro's Desire
summary:
In this short adventure, Gael navigates through the COVID-filled streets to satisfy a bro's desires. Watch as he suffers in the name of pure friendship (and unrequited feelings?)!

A remake of the 2020 Version, which was made for the Extra Credits Game Jam #6.
